src: قسمت اروپایی ترکیه (تراکیه شرقی یا روملی در شبه‌جزیره بالکان) 3% از کشور را تشکیل می‌دهد. قلمرو ترکیه بیش از 1,600 کیلومتر (1,000 مایل) از جهت طول و 800 کیلومتر (500 مایل) از جهت عرض ادامه یافته است، ضمن اینکه شکل کلی آن مستطیلی است. مساحت ترکیه، شامل دریاچه ها، 783562 کیلومتر مربع (300948 مایل مربع) را اشغال می کند، از این مقدار، 755688 کیلومتر مربع (291773 مایل مربع) در جنوب غربی آسیا و 23764 کیلومتر مربع (9174 مایل مربع) در اروپا قرار دارد. مساحت ترکیه از لحاظ بزرگی در جهان 37 ام است، و تقریباً اندازه مجموع مساحت فرانسه متروپل و انگلستان است. ترکیه از سه طرف توسط دریا احاطه شده است: از غرب با دریای اژه، از شمال با دریای سیاه و از جنوب با دریای مدیترانه.
mt: 3% of Turkey is in Europe (Eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan Peninsula). Turkey extends more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 miles) from east to west and 800 kilometres (500 miles) from north to south, and its overall shape is roughly rectangular. The area of Turkey, including lakes, is 783,562 km² (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 km² (291,773 sq mi) is in southwestern Asia and 23,764 km² (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey is the 37th largest country in the world, and is about the size of the combined area of metropolitan France and England. Turkey is surrounded by sea on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north, and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.
ref: European Turkey (eastern Thrace or Rumelia in the Balkan peninsula) includes 3% of the country. The territory of Turkey is more than 1,600 kilometres (1,000 mi) long and 800 km (500 mi) wide, with a roughly rectangular shape. Turkey's area, including lakes, occupies 783,562 square kilometres (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 square kilometres (291,773 sq mi) are in south west Asia and 23,764 square kilometres (9,174 sq mi) in Europe. Turkey's area makes it the world's 37th-largest country, and is about the size of Metropolitan France and the United Kingdom combined. Turkey is encircled by seas on three sides: the Aegean Sea to the west, the Black Sea to the north and the Mediterranean Sea to the south.

src: جمعیت شهر واتیکان حدود 800 نفر است. کوچکترین کشور مستقل در جهان است و نیز کمترین جمعیت در بین کشورها را دارد. شهر واتیکان از زبان ایتالیایی در حوزه قانون‌گذاری و ارتباطات اداری استفاده می‌کند. ایتالیایی همچنین یک زبان روزمره است که توسط اکثر کسانی که در این ایالت کار می کنند استفده می‌شود در حالی که در مراسم مذهبی اغلب از زبان لاتین استفاده می شود. همه شهروندان شهر واتیکان، کاتولیک رومی هستند.

src: تقریباً در هر خانه ای در شهرهای هاراپا و موهنجو-دارو توالت مجهز به فلاش تانک که به یک سیستم فاضلاب پیشرفته متصل است، وجود دارد. بقایای سیستم فاضلاب در خانه‌های شهرهای مینوسی‌ها و سانتورینی در یونان یافت شده است. در مصر باستان، ایران و چین نیز توالت وجود داشت. در تمدن روم، توالت‌ها گاهی بخشی از حمام‌های عمومی بودند و آنجا مردها و زن‌ها به‌صورت گروهی و مختلط حضور داشتند.
mt: Almost every house in the cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro has a flush toilet connected to an advanced sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini. In ancient Egypt, Iran, and China, the toilet was also used. In the Roman Empire, the toilets were sometimes part of public baths and there men and women were present in groups and mixed.
ref: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system. Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece. There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.

src: تیغه بکاررفته در اسکیت‌های مدرن روی یخ از یک لبه جفت برخوردار است که بین آنها تورفتگی وجود دارد. وجود دو لبه باعث می‌شود چسبندگی بهتری بر روی یخ داشته باشد، حتی زمانی که کج شود. از آنجا که ته تیغه کمی خمیده است، با خم شدن تیغه به این طرف و آن طرف، لبه ای که با یخ در تماس است نیز منحنی می‌شود. این کار باعث گردش اسکیت‌باز می‌شود. اگر اسکیت به راست کج شود، اسکیت‌باز هم به راست گردش می‌کند، و اگر به چپ کج شود، اسکیت‌باز به چپ گردش می‌کند.
mt: The blade of a modern ice skate has a double edge with a groove between them. The double edge provides better grip on the ice, even when it is tilted. Because the blade is slightly curved, the edge that is in contact with the ice also curves as the blade tilts to one side or the other. This causes the skater to turn. If the skate is tilted to the right, the skater turns to the right, and if it is tilted to the left, the skater turns to the left.
ref: The blade on a modern ice skate has a double edge with a concave hollow between them. The two edges allow for a better grasp of the ice, even when tilted. Because the bottom of the blade is slightly curved, as the blade tilts to one side or the other, the edge which is in contact with the ice also curves. This causes the skater to turn. If the skates tilt to the right, the skater turns right, if the skates tilt to the left, the skater turns left.

src: برای بازگشت به سطح انرژی قبلی خود، باید از انرژی اضافی که از نور دریافت کرده‌اند خلاص شوند. آنها این کار را با ساطع کردن ریزذره‌ای از نور به نام «فوتون» انجام می‌دهند. دانشمندان به این فرآیند «گسیل القایی تابش» می‌گویند زیرا نور درخشان باعث القای اتم‌ها می‌شود و درنتیجه به تابش فوتون نور منجر می‌گردد؛ و نور هم نوعی تابش است. تصویر بعدی اتم‌های ساطع کننده فوتون را نشان می دهد. البته، در واقعیت فوتون‌ها بسیار کوچکتر از عکسهای موجود در تصویر هستند. فوتون‌ها حتی از ذرات تشکیل‌دهنده اتم‌ها هم کوچکتر هستند!
mt: To return to their original energy state, they must get rid of the extra energy they have received from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon." Scientists call this process "stimulated emission of radiation" because the bright light stimulates the atoms to emit photons, which are also a form of radiation. The next image shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality, photons are much smaller than the images in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the particles that make up atoms!
ref: "To return to their previous energy level, they must get rid of the extra energy they got from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a ""photon"". Scientists call this process ""stimulated emission of radiation"" because the atoms are stimulated by the bright light, causing the emission of a photon of light, and light is a type of radiation. The next picture shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality photons are a lot smaller than those in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the stuff that makes up atoms!"

src: برای بازگشت به سطح انرژی قبلی خود، باید از انرژی اضافی که از نور دریافت کرده‌اند خلاص شوند. آنها این کار را با ساطع کردن ریزذره‌ای از نور به نام «فوتون» انجام می‌دهند. دانشمندان به این فرآیند «گسیل القایی تابش» می‌گویند زیرا نور درخشان باعث القای اتم‌ها می‌شود و درنتیجه به تابش فوتون نور منجر می‌گردد؛ و نور هم نوعی تابش است. تصویر بعدی اتم‌های ساطع کننده فوتون را نشان می دهد. البته، در واقعیت فوتون‌ها بسیار کوچکتر از عکسهای موجود در تصویر هستند. فوتون‌ها حتی از ذرات تشکیل‌دهنده اتم‌ها هم کوچکتر هستند!
mt: To return to their original energy state, they must get rid of the extra energy they have received from the light. They do this by emitting a tiny particle of light called a "photon." The next image shows the atoms emitting photons. Of course, in reality, photons are much smaller than the images in the picture. Photons are even smaller than the particles that make up atoms!

src: پس از صدها ساعت کار، رشته لامپ در نهایت می‌سوزد و لامپ دیگر کار نمی‌کند. سپس حباب لامپ باید تعویض گردد. هنگام تعویض حباب لامپ باید مراقب بود. ابتدا،‌ کلید متصل به لامپ باید خاموش گردد یا سیم آن قطع گردد. دلیلش این است که الکتریسیته‌ای که به داخل سوکت در محل قرارگیری قسمت فلزی حباب روانه می‌شود می‌تواند شوک الکتریکی شدیدی به شما بدهد البته اگر به داخل سوکت یا پایه فلزی حباب در حالی که بخشی از آن داخل سوکت است دست بزنید.
mt: After hundreds of hours of operation, the filament eventually burns out and the bulb no longer works. Then the bulb's envelope must be replaced. When replacing the bulb's envelope, be careful. First, the switch connected to the bulb must be turned off or the wire disconnected. The reason is that the electricity that is sent into the socket where the metal part of the bulb is placed can give you a very strong electric shock, of course, if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while a part of it is inside the socket.
ref: After hundreds of hours of operation the filament in the bulb eventually burns out and the light bulb no longer works. The light bulb then needs replacing. It is necessary to be careful in replacing the light bulb. First, the switch for the light fixture needs to be turned off or the cable disconnected. This is because electricity flowing into the socket where the metallic part of bulb sits can give you a severe electric shock if you touch the inside of the socket or the metal base of the bulb while it is still partly in the socket.

src: بمب شکافت هسته‌ای بر این قاعده استوار است که سرهم کردن یک هسته با تعداد زیادی پروتون و نوترون انرژی می‌برد. به‌نوعی مانند غلتاندن یک گاری سنگین به بالای تپه است. تقسیم شدن مجدد هسته اتم و سپس آزادسازی مقداری از آن انرژی. بعضی اتم‌ها هسته‌های ناپایداری دارند یعنی بدون اشاره یا با اشاره‌ای کوچک تمایل به فروپاشی دارند.
mt: A nuclear fission bomb is based on the principle that assembling a nucleus with a large number of protons and neutrons takes energy. It is like pushing a heavy truck up a hill. The nucleus then splits again and releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei, meaning they are prone to collapse without or with a little push.
ref: The fission bomb works on the principle that it takes energy to put together a nucleus with many protons and neutrons. Sort of like rolling a heavy cart up a hill. Splitting the nucleus up again then releases some of that energy. Some atoms have unstable nuclei which means that they tend to break apart with little or no nudging.

src: وقتی با کسی تماس می‌گیرید که هزاران مایل با شما فاصله دارد، دارید از ماهواره استفاده می‌کنید. ماهواره در فضا تماس را دریافت می‌کند و آن را تقریباً به‌صورت آنی به پایین منعکس می‌کند. این ماهواره توسط یک موشک به فضا فرستاده شد. دانشمندان از تلسکوپ‌ها در فضا استفاده می‌کنند زیرا جو زمین برخی از نورها و تصاویر را تحریف می‌کند. برای قرار دادن یک ماهواره یا تلسکوپ در فضا نیاز به موشکی بزرگ با ارتفاع بیش از 100 پا می‌باشد.
mt: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite receives the call and reflects it almost instantaneously back down. The satellite was launched by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth's atmosphere distorts some light and images. To place a satellite or telescope in space, you need a large rocket that is over 100 feet tall.
ref: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite. The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly. The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view. It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.

src: زمان هر جا هستیم وجود دارد و بر هر کاری که انجام می‌دهیم تأثیر می‌گذارد ولی فهم آن مشکل است. همانا زمان هزاران سال است که توسط دانشمندان دینی، فلسفی و علمی مورد مطالعه قرار گرفته است. ما زمان را به عنوان مجموعه‌ای از رویدادهای سپری شده از آینده به حال و گذشته تجربه می‌کنیم. زمان را می‌توان نحوه مقایسه مدت‌زمان (طول) رویدادها نیز دانست. خودتان می‌توانید با مشاهده تکرار یک رویداد دوره‌ای، گذشت زمان را مشخص کنید. یک رویداد دوره‌ای اتفاقی است که مرتب هربار تکرار می‌شود.
mt: Time is everywhere we are and affects everything we do, but understanding it is difficult. Time has been studied for thousands of years by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars. We experience time as a sequence of events from the future to the present and past. Time can also be thought of as a way to compare the duration of events. You can determine the passage of time by observing the recurrence of a periodic event. A periodic event is one that occurs repeatedly.
ref: Time is something that is all around us, and affects everything we do, yet is difficult to understand. Time has been studied by religious, philosophical, and scientific scholars for thousands of years. We experience time as a series of events passing from the future through the present to the past. Time is also how we compare the duration (length) of events. You can mark the passing of time yourself by observing the repetition of a cyclical event. A cyclical event is something that happens again and again regularly.

src: در قدیم اینطور بود که وارث تاج و تخت درست پس از اتمام تحصیل به سربازی می‌رفت. با این حال، چارلز به دانشگاه در کالج ترینیتی در کمبریج رفت و در آنجا به تحصیل مردم‌شناسی و باستان‌شناسی مشغول شد، و بعدها به تاریخ پرداخت و مدرک 2:2 (مدرک با درجه دوم پایین) را کسب کرد. «چارلز» اولین عضو از خانواده سلطنتی بریتانیا بود که به او مدرک تحصیلی داده شده است.
mt: In the past, the heir to the throne would go straight to the army after finishing his education. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge, and studied anthropology and archaeology, and later history, and received a 2:2 (a second class degree, the lowest level). "Charles" was the first member of the British royal family to receive a degree.
ref: Traditionally, the heir to the throne would go straight into the military after finishing school. However, Charles went to university at Trinity College, Cambridge where he studied Anthropology and Archaeology, and later History, earning a 2:2 (a lower second class degree). Charles was the first member of the British Royal Family to be awarded a degree.

src: انگلیس پس از تسلط مجدد بر دانلاو، مدت زمان طولانی شاهد صلح بود. با این حال، اتِلرِد در سال 991 با ناوگانی از وایکینگ‌ها مواجه شد که از هر ناوگان دیگری پس از گوترومِ یک قرن قبل عظیم‌تر بود. این ناوگان توسط اولاف تریگواسون نروژی با رویای بازپس گیری کشور خود از سلطه دانمارک هدایت می شد. پس از شکست نظامی اولیه، «اذلرد» توانست با شرایط «اولاف» موافقت کند؛ اولاف به نروژ بازگشت تا تلاش کند پادشاهی‌اش را با موفقیت نسبی بدست آورد.
mt: England had enjoyed a long period of peace after the reconquest of Danelaw. However, in 991, Ethelred was confronted by a fleet of Vikings, larger than any other since Guthrum's Great Army a century before. This fleet was led by Olaf Tryggvason of Norway, with the dream of regaining his country from Danish rule. After an initial military defeat, Ethelred agreed to Olaf's terms; Olaf returned to Norway to attempt to regain his kingdom with limited success.
ref: England had experienced a long period of peace after the reconquest of the Danelaw. However in 991 Ethelred was faced with a Viking fleet larger than any since Guthrum's a century earlier. This fleet was led by Olaf Trygvasson, a Norwegian with ambitions to reclaim his country from Danish domination. After initial military setbacks, Ethelred was able to agree to terms with Olaf, who returned to Norway to try to gain his kingdom with mixed success.

src: در حدود قرن 15، شمال استونی به شدت تحت تأثیر فرهنگ آلمان قرار داشت. برخی از راهبان آلمانی می خواستند خدا را به مردم بومی نزدیک‌تر کنند، بنابراین آنها زبان تحت لفظی استونی را اختراع کردند. این کار بر اساس الفبای آلمانی بود و یک نویسه «Õ/õ» اضافه شد. با گذشت زمان، بسیاری از وام‌واژه‌های برگرفته از آلمانی تلفیق شدند. این رخداد شروع روشنگری بود.
mt: 15th century, northern Estonia was strongly influenced by German culture. Some German monks wanted to make God closer to the natives, so they invented the Estonian language. This was based on the German alphabet and an extra letter «Õ/õ» was added. Over time, many loanwords derived from German were assimilated. This was the start of enlightenment.
ref: "Around the 15th century, northern Estonia was under great cultural influence of Germany. Some German monks wanted to bring God closer to the native people, so they invented the Estonian literal language. It was based on the German alphabet and one character ""Õ/õ"" was added. As time passed, many words that were borrowed from German coalesced. This was the beginning of enlightenment."

src: در مورد تعداد افرادی که به زبان هندی صحبت می‌کنند برآوردهای مختلفی وجود دارد. برآورد شده است که این زبان جایگاهی بین دوم تا چهارم را در زبان‌های پرکاربرد جهان دارد. تعداد متکلمان بومی بستگی به این دارد که گویش‌های خیلی نزدیک در شمارش محسوب شده باشند یا نه. تخمین تعداد سخنگویان بین 340 میلیون تا 500 میلیون متغیر است و تا 800 میلیون نفر می‌توانند این زبان را متوجه شوند. هندی و اردو در واژگان مشابه اما از نظر حروف الفبا متفاوت هستند؛ در مکالمه‌های روزمره، گویندگان هر دو زبان معمولاً می‌توانند یکدیگر را درک کنند.
mt: There are various estimates of the number of people who speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers depends on whether very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates of the number of speakers range from 340 million to 500 million and up to 800 million people can understand it. Hindi and Urdu have similar vocabularies but different alphabets; in everyday conversation, speakers of both languages usually can understand each other.
ref: There are varying estimates for how many people speak Hindi. It is estimated to be between the second and fourth most commonly spoken language in the world. The number of native speakers varies depending on whether or not very closely related dialects are counted. Estimates range from 340 million to 500 million speakers, and as many as 800 million people can understand the language. Hindi and Urdu are similar in vocabulary but different in script; in everyday conversations, speakers of both languages can usually understand each other.

src: هانگول تنها الفبای ابداعی هدفمند با کاربرد روزانه جاافتاده است. این الفبا را سال 1444 طی سلطنت پادشاه سجونگ (1418 - 1450) ابداع کردند. پادشاه «سجونگ» چهارمین پادشاه از سلسله چوسان و یکی از محترم‌ترین پادشاه‌ها بوده است. او در اصل الفبای Hangeul را به Hunmin Jeogeum نامگذاری کرده است که به معنای «صداهای صحیح برای آموزش مردم» است.
mt: Hangul is the only alphabet invented with a specific purpose and widely used. It was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 - 1450). King Sejong was the fourth king of the Joseon dynasty and one of the most respected kings. He originally named the alphabet Hunmin Jeongeum, which means "Correct Sounds for the Instruction of the People".
ref: "Hangeul is the only purposely invented alphabet in popular daily use. The alphabet was invented in 1444 during the reign of King Sejong (1418 – 1450). src: نظریه‌های بسیاری درباره نحوه بوجود آمدن سانسکریت وجود دارد. یکی از آنها درباره مهاجرت یک آریایی از غرب به هندوستان است که زبانش را به آنجا آورد. سانسکریت یک زبان باستانی است و قابل مقایسه است با زبان لاتین که در اروپا صحبت می شود. اولین کتاب شناخته شده جهان به زبان سانسکریت نوشته شده است. پس از تدوین اوپانیشاد، سانسکریت به‌دلیل سلسله مراتبش محو شد. سانسکریت زبانی بسیار پیچیده و غنی است که به‌عنوان منشاء بسیاری از زبان‌های هندی مدرن عمل کرده است، درست مثل لاتین که منشاء زبان‌های اروپایی مثل فرانسه و اسپانیایی است.
mt: There are many theories about the origin of Sanskrit. One of them is about the migration of an Aryan from the west to India, bringing his language with him. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to Latin, which is spoken in Europe. The first book known to be written in Sanskrit was written. After the composition of the Upanishads, Sanskrit was lost due to its hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language that has acted as the source of many modern Indian languages, just like Latin, which is the source of European languages such as French and Spanish.
ref: There are many theories to how Sanskrit came into existence. One of them is about an Aryan migration from the west into India who brought their language with them. Sanskrit is an ancient language and is comparable to the Latin language spoken in Europe. The earliest known book in the world was written in Sanskrit. After the compilation of Upanishads, Sanskrit just faded due to hierarchy. Sanskrit is a very complex and rich language, which has served to be the source for many modern Indian languages, just like Latin is the source for European languages like French and Spanish.

src: نیروی جاذبه ایو چطور روی من تاثیر خواهد داشت؟ اگر روی سطح ایو بایستید، وزن کمتری از وزن خود در زمین خواهید داشت. شخصی که روی زمین 200 پوند (90 کیلوگرم) وزن دارد، حدود 36 پوند (16 کیلوگرم) در lo وزن دارد. بنابراین گرانش کمتر شما را به سمت خود می‌کشد.
mt: How will gravity affect me on the Moon? If you stand on the surface of the Moon, you will weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90 kilograms) on Earth weighs about 36 pounds (16 kilograms) on the Moon. So the Moon's gravity pulls you less strongly toward itself.
ref: How would Io's gravity pull on me? If you stood on the surface of Io, you would weigh less than you do on Earth. A person who weighs 200 pounds (90kg) on Earth would weigh about 36 pounds (16kg) on Io. So the gravity, of course, pulls less on you.

src: سطح کره ماه را صخره و خاک تشکیل داده است. لایه بیرونی ماه پوسته نامیده می‌شود. پوسته در ضلع نزدیک حدود 70 کیلومتر و در سمت دورتر دارای 100 کیلومتر ضخامت دارد. زیر دریاوارها نازک‌تر و زیر زمین‌های مرتفع ضخیم‌تر است. از آنجا که پوسته نازک‌تر می‌شود، ممکن است در طرف نزدیک آن دریاوار بیشتر باشد. گدازه آسان‌تر به بالا و سطح می‌آید.
mt: The lunar surface is made up of rock and dust. The outer layer of the moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 kilometers thick near the equator and about 100 kilometers thick at the poles. The mantle is thinner and the core is thicker under the highlands. As the crust gets thinner, the mantle may be more extensive near the equator. Magma is easier to rise to the surface.
ref: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust. The crust is about 70 km thick on the near side and 100 km thick on the far side. It is thinner under the maria and thicker under the highlands. There may be more maria on the near side because the crust is thinner. It was easier for lava to rise up to the surface.

src: بسیاری از مردم رویای روزی را دارند که آدمی بتواند به ستاره دیگری سفر کند و دنیاهای دیگر را کشف کند، برخی از مردم از چیزی که آنجا باشد حیرت‌زده خواهند شد و برخی معتقدند که بیگانگان یا دیگر انواع زندگی ممکن است در دیگر سیارات وجود داشته باشد. اما، اگر این اتفاق رخ دهد احتمالاً برای مدت زمانی طولانی اتفاقی نخواهد افتاد. ستاره‌ها به‌قدری از هم دور هستند که بین ستاره‌های «همسایه» تریلیون‌ها مایل فاصله هست. آیا روزی فراخواهد رسید که نبیره‌های شما در کنار دنیایی بیگانه باشند و از اجداد باستانی‌شان متعجب شوند؟
mt: Many people dream of a day when humans can travel to another star and discover other worlds, some will be amazed at what is there and some believe that aliens or other forms of life may exist on other planets. But if this happens, it will not happen for a long time. Stars are so far apart that there are trillions of miles between "neighbor" stars. Will there ever be a day when your grandchildren are next to an alien world and are amazed at their ancestors?
ref: "Many people dream of the day when humans can travel to another star and explore other worlds, some people wonder what's out there some belive that aliens or other life may live on another plant. But, if this ever does happen probably won't happen for a very long time. The stars are so spread out that there are trillions of miles between stars that are ""neighbors"". Maybe one day, your great grandchildren will be standing atop an alien world wondering about their ancient ancestors?"

src: خورشید پوسته‌ای شبیه کره زمین ندارد که بتوانید روی آن بایستید. کل خورشید از گازها، آتش و پلاسما ساخته شده است. هرچه از مرکز خورشید دورتر شوید، این گاز رقیق‌تر می‌شود. وقتی به خورشید نگاه می‌کنیم قسمت بیرونی که می‌بینیم فوتوسفر گفته می‌شود که به معنی «توپ نور» است.
mt: The Sun does not have a solid crust like the Earth. The whole Sun is made of gas, fire and plasma. The further you get from the Sun's center, the gas becomes less dense. When we look at the Sun, the outer part we see is called the photosphere, which means "ball of light."
ref: "The Sun doesn't have a crust like the Earth that you can stand on. The whole Sun is made out of gases, fire, and plasma. The gas becomes thinner as you go farther from the center of the Sun. The outer-part we see when we look at the Sun is called the photosphere, which means ""ball of light""."

src: حدود سه هزار سال بعد، در 1610، ستاره‌شناس ایتالیایی گالیلئو گالیله با استفاده از یک تلسکوپ متوجه شد سیاره زهره دقیقاً مانند ماه، دارای قمرهایی است. نمودها صورت می‌گیرند زیرا فقط طرف زهره (یا ماه) که طرف خورشید است روشن می‌شود. نمودهای زهره از نظریه کوپرنیک حمایت می‌کند مبنی براینکه سیارات دور خورشید می‌گردند. سپس چند سال بعد در 1639، یک منجم انگلیسی به نام «جرمایا هاروکس» یک گذر زهره را مشاهده کرد.
mt: 3,000 years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to discover that the planet Venus, like the moon, has moons. The phases of Venus are seen because only the side of Venus (or the moon) facing the sun is illuminated. The phases of Venus support the Copernican theory that the planets orbit the sun. Then a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named "Jeremiah Horrocks" observed a transit of Venus.
ref: About three thousand years later, in 1610, Italian astronomer Galileo Galilei used a telescope to observe that Venus has phases, just as the moon does. Phases happen because only the side of Venus (or of the Moon) facing the Sun is lighted. The phases of Venus supported the theory of Copernicus that the planets go around the Sun. Then, a few years later in 1639, an English astronomer named Jeremiah Horrocks observed a transit of Venus.

src: رودخانه آمازون دومین رودخانه از نظر طول و بزرگترین رودخانه کره زمین است. مقدار آبی که این رودخانه با خود می‌برد 8 برابر بیشتر از دومین رودخانه بزرگ جهان است. آمازون پهناورترین رودخانه روی کره زمین نیز هست، و در نقاطی عرض آن به شش مایل می‌رسد. بیست درصد کامل از آبی که از رودخانه‌های زمین به اقیانوسها می‌ریزد از رودخانه آمازون می‌آید. بستر اصلی رود آمازون 6387 کیلومتر (3980 مایل) است و آب هزاران رودخانه کوچک را جمع‌آوری می‌کند.
mt: The Amazon is the second longest and largest river in the world. The amount of water it carries is eight times greater than the second largest river in the world. The Amazon is the widest river in the world, reaching six miles in width in some places. Twenty percent of all the water that flows from the rivers of the world into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main channel of the Amazon is 3,980 miles long and collects the water of thousands of small rivers.
ref: The Amazon River is the second longest and the biggest river on Earth. It carries more than 8 times as much water as the second biggest river. The Amazon is also the widest river on Earth, at times six miles wide. A full 20 percent of the water that pours out of the planet's rivers into the oceans comes from the Amazon. The main Amazon River is 6,387 km (3,980 miles). It collects water from thousands of smaller rivers.

src: هجده درصد از مردم ونزوئلا بیکار هستند و اکثر آنهایی که شاغل هستند در اقتصاد غیررسمی کار می‌کنند. دو سوم ونزوئلایی‌های شاغل در بخش خدمات این کار را انجام می‌دهند، یعنی تقریباً یک‌چهارم حجم کار در صنعت و یک‌پنجم حجم کار در کشاورزی. نفت یک صنعت مهم برای ونزوئلا ها است، در کشوری که صادرکننده خالص است، حتی اگر تنها یک درصد در صنعت نفت کار کند.
mt: 18% of Venezuelans are unemployed and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two-thirds of Venezuelan workers are in the service sector, which is about one-fourth of the industrial sector and one-fifth of the agricultural sector. Oil is an important industry for Venezuelans, in a country that is a net exporter, even if only one percent of the workforce is in the oil industry.
ref: Eighteen percent of Venezuelans are unemployed, and most of those who are employed work in the informal economy. Two thirds of Venezuelans who work do so in the service sector, nearly a quarter work in industry and a fifth work in agriculture. An important industry for Venezuelans is oil, where the country is a net exporter, even though only one percent work in the oil industry.

src: ستارگان به دلیل انرژی ایجاد شده هنگام ادغام (یا ذوب شدن) اتم های هیدروژن برای ساخت عناصر سنگین تر، نور و گرما تولید می‌کنند. دانشمندان در تلاش هستند رآکتوری بسازند که به همان روش انرژی تولید کند. با این حال، حل این مشکل کار بسیار سختی است و تا ساخت راکتورهای مفید فیوژن سال‌ها طول خواهد کشید.
mt: Stars produce light and heat by fusing hydrogen atoms to create heavier elements. Scientists are trying to build a reactor that produces energy in the same way. However, solving this problem is a difficult task and it will take years to build useful fusion reactors.
ref: Stars give off light and heat because of the energy made when hydrogen atoms are merged (or fused) together to form heavier elements. Scientists are working to create a reactor that can make energy in the same way. This, however, is a very hard problem to solve and will take many years before we see useful fusion reactors built.

src: عناصر و ترکیبات می‌توانند بدون تغییر، از یک حالت به حالت دیگر جابجا شوند. نیتروژن به عنوان یک گاز هنوز همان ویژگی های نیتروژن مایع را دارد. حالت مایع متراکم تر است اما مولکول ها کماکان همان‌ها هستند. آب نمونه دیگری است. آب از دو اتم هیدروژن و یک اتم اکسیژن مرکب تشکیل شده است. ساختار مولکولی آن چه گاز باشد و چه مایع یا جامد، یکسان است. با اینکه حالت فیزیکی آن ممکن است عوض شود، حالت شیمیایی آن تغییری نمی‌کند.
mt: Elements and compounds can change from one state to another without changing. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties of liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is more dense but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. Water is composed of two atoms of hydrogen and one atom of oxygen. The molecular structure is the same whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although the physical state may change, the chemical state does not.
ref: Elements and compounds can move from one state to another and not change. Nitrogen as a gas still has the same properties as liquid nitrogen. The liquid state is denser but the molecules are still the same. Water is another example. The compound water is made up of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom. It has the same molecular structure whether it is a gas, liquid, or solid. Although its physical state may change, its chemical state remains the same.

src: در خلال جنگ انقلابی، نخست سیزده ایالت تحت اصول کنفدراسیون یک دولت مرکزی ضعیف را تشکیل دادند - که کنگره تنها مؤلفه آن بود. کنگره فاقد هرگونه قدرت برای تحمیل مالیات بود، چون هیچ مجری یا دادگستری ملی‌ای وجود نداشت، و برای اجرای همه اعمال خود به مقامات دولتی که غالباً همکاری نمی‌کردند متکی بود. همچنین هیچ مرجعی برای لغو قوانین مالیاتی و تعرفه ها بین کشورها نداشت. پیش از اصلاح این بندها لازم بود تا موافقت متفق‌القول همه کشورها کسب شود و کشورها نیز باید نظر مثبت دولت مرکزی‌شان را حتی در صورت غایب بودن نماینده بدست آورند.
mt: During the Revolutionary War, the first thirteen states formed a weak central government under the Articles of Confederation – the Congress was the only component. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, as there was no national executive or judiciary, and relied on state governments that often refused to cooperate. It also lacked a mechanism to repeal tariffs and trade restrictions between states. Before amending these provisions, unanimous agreement of all states was required, and states also had to obtain the positive opinion of their central government, even if their representative was absent.
ref: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation. Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts. It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states. The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src: اگر فیلم «گنج ملی» را تماشا کرده باشید ممکن است فکر کنید که یک نقشه گنج در پشت اعلامیه استقلال نوشته شده است. با این حال، چنان چیزی درست نیست. با اینکه چیزی پشت سند نوشته شده است، این سند نقشه گنج نیست. در پشت اعلامیه استقلال این عبارت نوشته شده بود «اعلامیه اصلی استقلال مورخ 4 جولای 1776». متن در پایین سند، به شکل وارونه ظاهر می شود. در حالی که هنوز کسی نمی‌داند چه کسی آن را نوشته اما معروف است که این سند بزرگ خطی در اوایل عمر خود، (با ابعاد 29¾ اینچ در 24½ اینچ) برای نگهداری آویزان شده بود. بنابراین، این احتمال هست که یادداشت‌ صرفاً به‌عنوان برچسب الصاق شده باشد.
mt: If you've seen the movie "National Treasure," you might think that the Declaration of Independence has a treasure map written on the back. However, that's not the case. There is something written on the back of the Declaration, but it's not a treasure map. The back of the Declaration reads "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4 July 1776." The text appears upside down at the bottom of the document. While no one knows who wrote it, it is known that the large, straight line in the document's early life (29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was hung for storage. Therefore, the note may have been simply taped on as a label.
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: اوایل استقلال این ملت، تخصص باغ گیاه‌شناسی سنگاپور کمک کرد این جزیره به شهری با باغ گرمسیری تبدیل شود. در 1981، ارکیده سنگاپوری، که یک ارکیده ترکیبی است، به عنوان گل ملی کشور انتخاب شد.
mt: In the early days of its independence, Singapore's botanical expertise helped turn the island into a tropical city. In 1981, the orchid of Singapore, a hybrid orchid, was chosen as the country's national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: گرچه ساخت اهرام سنگی تا پایان پادشاهی کهن ادامه داشت، هرگز اهرامی نبود که از لحاظ بزرگی و برتری فنی در ساخت از اهرام ثلاثه پیشی بگیرد. پادشاهی جدید مصریان باستان از دیدن بناهای تاریخی پیشنیانشان شگفت زده شد، بناهایی که قدمتی بیش از هزار سال داشتند.
mt: Although the construction of stone pyramids continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, there was never a pyramid that was larger or more technically advanced than the pyramids of the three kings. The New Kingdom of the Egyptians was amazed to see the historical buildings of their predecessors, buildings that were more than a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: سالانه تقریباً 1.5 میلیون علف‌خوار حدود اکتبر از سمت تپه‌های شمالی بخاطر باران با گذر از رودخانه مارا به سمت دشت‌های جنوبی مسافرت می‌کنند. پس از باران در حدود آوریل، از غرب دوباره به شمال برگشت و دوباره از رودخانه مارا عبور کرد. منطقه سرنگتی شامل پارک ملی سرنگتی، منطقه حفاظت شده نگورونگورو و منطقه حفاظت شده جانوران شکاری ماسوا در تانزانیا و منطقه حفاظت شده ملی مائایی مارا در کنیا می‌شود.
mt: 1.5 million wildebeest migrate south from the northern hills in October, crossing the Mara River. After the rains in April, they return west to the north, crossing the Mara River again. The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Conservation Area, and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: با نبرد فرانسه، آلمان خود را برای حمله به جزیره انگلیس آماده کرد. آلمان این عملیات را با نام «عملیات سیلیون» رمزگذاری کرد. اکثر سلاح‌های سنگین و آماد ارتش بریتانیا زمانی که از دانکرک خارج می‌شد مفقود شده بود، بنابراین ارتش نسبتاً ضعیف بود. اما نیروی دریایی بریتانیا بازهم بسیار قدرتمندتر از نیروی دریایی آلمان («کریگزمارینه») بود و می‌توانست هر ناوگان تهاجمی اعزامی به کانال انگلیس را نابود کند. با وجود این، تعداد خیلی کمی از کشتی‌های نیروی دریایی سلطنتی در نزدیکی مسیرهای حمله احتمالی مستقر بودند زیرا آدمیرال‌ها می‌ترسیدند که توسط نیروی هوایی آلمان غرق شوند.
mt: With the Fall of France, Germany prepared to attack the island of Britain. Germany codenamed this operation "Sealion". Most of the heavy weapons and equipment of the British Army were lost when it was evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was relatively weak. However, the Royal Navy was still much more powerful than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. Despite this, very few Royal Navy ships were stationed near likely invasion routes because admirals were afraid of being sunk by the German Air Force.
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: اجازه دهید ابتدا درباره طرح‌های ایتالیا توضیح دهیم. ایتالیا در اصل «برادر کوچک» آلمان و ژاپن بود. اگرچه آنها تازه قبل از آغاز جنگ چهار کشتی جدید ساخته بودند، اما از ارتش ضعیف تر و نیروی دریایی ضعیف تری برخوردار بودند. اهداف اصلی ایتالیا کشورهای آفریقایی بودند. آنها برای بدست آوردن این کشورها لازم بود یک پایگاه اعزام نیرو داشته باشند تا نیروها بتوانند از راه دریای مدیترانه بروند و به آفریقا حمله کنند. به همین دلیل باید از شر پایگاه‌ها و کشتی‌های بریتانیا در مصر خلاص می‌شدند. کشتی‌های جنگی ایتالیا به‌جز آن اقدامات قرار نبود کار دیگری انجام دهند. اما در مورد ژاپن. ژاپن کشور جزیره‌ای درست مثل بریتانیا بود.
mt: Let's start with Italy first. Italy was the "younger brother" of Germany and Japan. Although they had just built four new ships before the war started, they were weaker in army and navy. Italy's main targets were African countries. They needed a base to send troops to Africa through the Mediterranean Sea. So they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Italian warships were only to do that. But Japan. Japan was an island country just like Britain.
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: فرودهای روز آغاز حمله و نبردهای بعدی شمال فرانسه را آزاد کرده بود، اما جنوب هنوز آزاد نبود. آنجا تحت حکومت فرانسویان «ویشی» بود. اینها فرانسویانی بودند که در سال 1940 با آلمانی‌ها صلح کردند و به‌جای جنگ با مهاجمان، با آنها همکاری کردند. در 15 اوت 1940، متفقین به جنوب فرانسه حمله کردند، این تهاجم «عملیات دراگون» نام گرفت. تنها در عرض دو هفته، آمریکایی‌ها و نیروهای فرانسه آزاد موفق شدند جنوب فرانسه را آزاد کرده و به سمت آلمان تغییر مسیر دهند.
mt: 15 August 1940, the Allies launched Operation Dragoon, an invasion of southern France. In two weeks, American and Free French forces had liberated southern France and turned north toward Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: فرودهای روز آغاز حمله و نبردهای بعدی شمال فرانسه را آزاد کرده بود، اما جنوب هنوز آزاد نبود. آنجا تحت حکومت فرانسویان «ویشی» بود. اینها فرانسویانی بودند که در سال 1940 با آلمانی‌ها صلح کردند و به‌جای جنگ با مهاجمان، با آنها همکاری کردند. در 15 اوت 1940، متفقین به جنوب فرانسه حمله کردند، این تهاجم «عملیات دراگون» نام گرفت. تنها در عرض دو هفته، آمریکایی‌ها و نیروهای فرانسه آزاد موفق شدند جنوب فرانسه را آزاد کرده و به سمت آلمان تغییر مسیر دهند.
mt: 15 August 1940, the Allies launched Operation Dragoon, an invasion of southern France. In two weeks, American and Free French forces had liberated southern France and turned north toward Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: زیردریایی‌ها کشتی‌هایی هستند که برای پیمایش در زیر آب و ماندن در آنجا به مدت طولانی ساخته شده‌اند. از زیردریایی‌ها در جنگ جهانی اول و دوم استفاده می‌شد. آن موقع سرعتشان خیلی کم و بُرد تیراندازی‌شان بسیار محدود بود. در آغاز جنگ، زیردریایی‌ها بیشتر روی آب دریا حرکت می‌کردند، اما با بکارگیری رادار و دقیق‌تر شدن آن، آنها محبور شدند برای دیده نشدن، به زیر آب بروند. زیردریایی‌های آلمانی یو-بوت نام داشتند. آلمان‌ها در ناوبری و کار با زیردریایی‌هایشان بسیار ماهر بودند. به دلیل موفقیت آنها در مورد زیردریایی‌ها، پس از جنگ به آلمانی‌ها اعتماد نمی‌شود تا بسیاری از آن‌ها را داشته باشند.
mt: Submarines are ships that are designed to travel and stay underwater for long periods of time. They were used in World War I and World War II. At the beginning of the war, submarines mostly moved on the surface of the water, but with the use of radar and the improvement of it, they were forced to go underwater to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-boats. The Germans were very skilled in navigation and working with submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war, the Germans were not trusted to have many of them.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: تا هفدهم سپتامبر سال 1939، دفاع کشور لهستان درهم شکسته شد و تنها امیدی که وجود داشت عقب نشینی و سازماندهی مجدد در طول منطقه سرپل رومانی بود. اما این نقشه‌ها تقریباً یک شبه از کار افتاد، وقتی که بیش از 800 هزار سرباز از ارتش سرخ اتحاد جماهیر شوروی وارد شدند و پس از هجوم به نواحی شرقی لهستان جبهه‌های بلاروسی و اوکراینی را ساختند، و بدین ترتیب عهدنامه صلح ریگا، پیمان عدم تجاوز بین شوروی و لهستان، و سایر عهدنامه‌های بین‌المللی، هم دوجانبه و هم چند جانبه، نقض کردند.
mt: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense had been shattered and the only hope was a retreat and reorganization in the Romanian border region. But these plans were almost immediately thwarted when over 800,000 soldiers from the Red Army of the Soviet Union invaded and after the attack on the eastern Polish regions created the Belorussian and Ukrainian fronts, thus violating the non-aggression pact between the Soviet Union and Poland, and other bilateral and multilateral treaties.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: تقریباً از همان ابتدا شرایط برای ایتالیایی‌ها در شمال آفریقا خوب پیش نرفت. در یک هفته‌ای که از اعلام جنگ ایتالیا در 10 ژوئن 1940 اعلام شد، نیروهای 11th Hussars بریتانیا موق شدند Fort Capuzzo را در لیبی تصرف کنند. در کمین شرق بردیا، انگلیسی‌ها مهندس ارشد ارتش دهم ایتالیا، ژنرال لاستوچی را به اسارت گرفتند. در 28 ژوئن، مارشال ایتالو بالبو، حاکم کل لیبی و وارث ظاهری موسولینی، هنگام فرود در طبرق با آتش خودی کشته شد.
mt: 11th Hussars, British forces, quickly took Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In the east, British forces captured the senior engineer of the 10th Army, General Lastrucci. On 28 June, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor-General of Libya and Mussolini's heir apparent, was killed by friendly fire when landing at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: آیین بودایی تبتی بر پایه آموزه‌های بودا است، اما با راه عشق ماهایانا و تکنیکهای زیادی از یوگای هندی بسط داده شد. در اصل بودیسم تبتی خیلی ساده است، و شامل کندالینی یوگا،‌ مراقبه و مسیر عشق فراگیر می‌شود. با استفاده از یوگا کوندالینی، انرژی کوندالینی (انرژی روشنگری) از طریق حرکات یوگا، تمرین های تنفسی، مانترا و تجسم بیدار می شود. مرکز مراقبه تبت، یوگای خدایان است. از طریق تجسم خدایان مختلف، کانال های انرژی پاک می شوند، چاکراها فعال می شوند و آگاهی روشنگری ایجاد می شود.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but has been expanded with the love of Mahayana and many techniques of Indian yoga. In fact, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple, and includes Kundalini yoga, meditation and all-embracing love. Using Kundalini yoga, Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga movements, breathing exercises, mantra and visualization. The Tibetan meditation center is the yoga of the gods. Through the visualization of different gods, the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and enlightenment is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

mt: 8:30 am local time (15:00 UTC) program started. Famous singers from all over the country bhajans were offering or songs of sacrifice for the feet of Shri Shyam. Night with the singing of "Sanju Sharma" started and then "Jay Shankar Choudhary" had the performance. Also chappan bhog bhajan was offered. Singer "Raju Khandalwal" accompanied him. Then, Lakhia Singh took over the leadership of the bhajans in singing. 108 Chapan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different food items, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, bowl and etc. that are offered to the gods) is offered to Baba Shyam. Lakhia Singh also offered Chapan Bhog Bhajan. Singer, Raju Khandalwal also accompanied him.

Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: این جشن‌ها با برنامه ویژه‌ای از گروه «سیرک آفتاب» که شهرتشان جهانی بود آغاز می‌شد. یک گروه ینی‌چری و خوانندگان Fatih Erkoç و Müslüm Gürses توسط ارکستر سمفونیک ایالتی استانبول دنبال شد. سپس Whirling Dervishes به صحنه رفت. دیوا سزن آکسو ترکی با تنر آلساندرو سفینا ایتالیایی و خواننده یونانی هریس الکسیو برنامه اجرا کرد. برای حسن ختام، گروه رقص ترکی Fire of Anatolia نمایش «تروی» را اجرا کرد.
mt: The festivities began with a special program by the "Sun Circus" group, who were well known worldwide. A group of Janissaries and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses were followed by the State Symphony Orchestra of Istanbul. Then Whirling Dervishes came to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. For the finale, the Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the "Troy" show.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

mt: The latest news bulletin reported that the sea level readings indicated a tsunami was underway. Activity related to a tsunami was confirmed near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries were reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily cut, which according to reports prevented officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Despite the cancellation of the warnings, fourteen schools on the Hawaiian coast or near it were closed for the entire Wednesday.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: جانی رید، سرمربی تیم A1 گرند پری نیوزلند، امروز با ثبت سریعترین رانندگی مسیر پل 48 ساله اوکلند هاربور، نیوزیلند به صورت قانونی نام خود را در تاریخ ثبت کرد. آقای «رید» موفق شد ماشین A1 گراندپری نیوزلند «بلک بیوتی» را روی پل هفت بار با سرعت بیش از 160 کیلومتر در ساعت براند. پلیس نیوزلند برای تعیین سرعت آقای رید در استفاده از اسلحه های رادار سرعت خود به دلیل سرعت پایین زیبایی سیاه مشكل داشت و تنها زمانی موفق شد سرعت آقای رید را تشخیص دهد که او به سرعتش را به 160 کیلومتر در ساعت کاهش داده بود.
mt: John Reid, the A1 Grand Prix New Zealand team manager, today set a new record for the fastest legal drive over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand. Mr. "Reid" managed to drive the A1 Grand Prix New Zealand "Black Beauty" over the bridge seven times at a speed of over 160 kilometers per hour. The New Zealand police had difficulty determining Mr. Reid's speed using their radar speed guns due to the low speed of the "Black Beauty" and only managed to determine Mr. Reid's speed when he reduced his speed to 160 kilometers per hour.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

mt: 10:08 p.m. local time on Monday, a magnitude 4.0 earthquake shook western Montana. No immediate reports of damage were received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center. The epicenter of this earthquake was about 20 kilometers (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

mt: As law enforcement officers were absent from the streets of Bishkek, according to reports, widespread looting continued through the night. As the people's groups poured into the streets and looted consumer goods stores, Bishkek sank into a state of "chaos" from the mouth of one witness. Some residents of Bishkek blamed the south's protesters for lawlessness.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: پیش از این، مدیرعامل رینگ، جیمی‌ سیمینوف، خاطر نشان کرد كه شركت هنگامی‌ شروع به کار می‌کند كه صدای زنگ در وی از گاراژ وی شنیده نشود. وی گفت که یک زنگ درب WiFi ساخته است. سیمینوف گفت پس از ظاهر شدن وی در سال 2013 در یک قسمت از نمایش Shark Tank، فروش افزایش یافت، جایی که نشست نمایش از پرداخت بودجه برای راه‌اندازی خودداری کرده بود. در اواخر سال 2017، سیمینوف در کانال تلویزیونی فروشگاهی QVC ظاهر شد. رینگ همچنین یک دعوای قانونی را با شرکت امنیتی رقیب، شرکت ADT، حل و فصل کرد.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that the company would start when the sound of the doorbell from his garage was not heard. He said that a WiFi doorbell has been made. Siminoff said that after appearing in a segment of Shark Tank in 2013, sales increased, where the show refused to fund the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Ring also settled a lawsuit with rival security company ADT.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: نمایش PBS بیش از دوجین جوایز Emmy را به ارمغان آورده است و پخش آن فقط کوتاه‌تر از سریال‌های سسمی استریت و محله آقای راجرز است. هر قسمت از این برنامه روی درون‌مایه‌ای از یک کتاب مشخص تمرکز می‌کرد و سپس با داستان‌های مختلف به عمق آن درون‌مایه می‌پرداخت. همچنین هر نمایش حاوی توصیه‌هایی پیرامون کتابهایی است که کودکان باید هنگام مراجعه به کتابخانه به دنبال آنها باشند. جان گرنت، از شبکه WNED Buffalo (ایستگاه خانگی برنامه Reading Rainbow) گفت: «برنامه Reading Rainbow به بچه‌ها دلیل مطالعه کردن را یاد داد، ... عشق به مطالعه — [این برنامه] بچه‌ها را تشویق کرد که کتابی بردارند و مطالعه کنند.» برخی از جمله جان گرانت معتقدند که هم بحران بودجه و هم تغییر فلسفه برنامه‌های آموزشی تلویزیون منجر شد این دست سریال‌ها پایان یابند.
mt: Reading Rainbow  has won more than a dozen Emmys and is shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focused on a specific book and then delved into the topic with different stories. Each show also contained recommendations of books children should look for at the library. John Grant, from the WNED Buffalo PBS station (the show's home station), said, "Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and read." Some, including John Grant, believe that both budget cuts and changes in educational television programming led to the end of this type of show.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

mt: Authorities in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House said the tree was infected with a fungus and posed a threat to public health and people thought it was in danger of falling at any moment. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved by an emergency injunction.

src: انجمن آزادی حیوانات و انجمن سلطنتی جلوگیری از آزار حیوانات (RSPCA) دوباره دارند تقاضا می‌کنند که نصب دوربین‌های مداربسته در کلیه کشتارگاه‌های استرالیا الزامی شود. سرناظر RSPCA ایالت نیو ساوت ولز آقای دیوید او شانِسی به ABC گفت نظارت و بازرسی بر کشتارگاه‌ها باید یک امر عادی و روتین در استرالیا باشد. «دوربین مداربسته مطمئناً برای افرادی‌که با حیوانات کار می‌کنند نشانه‌ای قوی است که نشان می‌دهد رفاه آن‌ها بالاترین اولویت را دارد.»
mt: The Animal Liberation Association and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. NSW RSPCA supervisor Mr David O'Shannessy told the ABC that oversight and inspection of abattoirs should be a normal and routine matter in Australia. "CCTV is certainly a strong sign to those who work with animals that their welfare is the highest priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: اخبار منتشر شده در رد لایک امروز اختصاص داشت به مراسم خاکسپاری جف ویس و سه نفر از هفت قربانی و اینکه دستگیری یک دانش‌آموز دیگر در ارتباط با تیراندازی در مدرسه در تاریخ 21 مارچ. مقامات به صورت نسبتا رسمی دستگیری امروز را تصدیق کردند. با این حال، منبعی مطلع از تجسس به روزنامه Star-Tribune مینیاپولیس گفته بود که لوییس جوردِین، پسر 16 ساله فلوید جوردِین، رئیس شورای شهر Red Lake Tribal، بوده است. در مقطع فعلی مشخص نیست چه اتهاماتی وارد خواهد شد یا چه سرنخ‌هایی مراجع را به آن پسر رسانده است، اما دادرسی‌های نوجوانان در دادگاه فدرال شروع شده است.
mt: 21 March 2003 news coverage focused on the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the seven victims, and the arrest of another student in connection with the shooting at the school on 21 March. Authorities officially confirmed the arrest today, but an informed source told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Floyd Jourdain, the chairman of the Red Lake Tribal Council, was the one arrested. At this time it is not known what charges will be filed or what leads brought the teenager to the attention of the authorities, but juvenile proceedings are underway in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: برگزارکنندگان این اعتراض اعلام کرددند که حدود 100,000 نفر در شهرهای مختلف آلمان مانند برلین، کلن، هامبورگ و هانوفر حضور داشتند. در برلین، پلیس جمعیت معترضان را 6500 نفر تخمین زده است. اعتراضات در شهر پاریس، صوفیای بلغارستان، ویلنیوس لیتوانی، والتای مالت، تالین استونی، و ادینبورگ و گلاسگوی اسکاتلند صورت گرفتند. در لندن، حدود 200 نفر در خارج از برخی دفاتر دارندگان حق نسخه‌برداری دست به اعتراض زدند. ماه گذشته، هنگامی که لهستان ACTA را امضا کرد، اعتراضات بزرگی در آن کشور صورت گرفت که منجر شد دولت لهستان در حال حاضر این توافق نامه را تصویب نکند. لتونی و اسلواکی هر دو پیوستن به ACTA را به تأخیر انداختند.
mt: 100,000 people in cities across Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, took part in the protest. In Berlin, police estimated the crowd at 6,500. Protests were also held in Paris, Sofia, Vilnius, Valletta, Tallinn, Edinburgh and Glasgow. In London, about 200 people protested outside some copyright holders' offices. Last month, when Poland signed ACTA, large protests took place in that country, leading the Polish government to currently not ratify the agreement. Latvia and Slovakia both delayed joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: حدود 60 مورد گرمای بیش از حد آیپاد‌ها گزارش شده است که در مجموع منجر به ایجاد شش آتش سوزی و مصدومیت جزئی چهار نفر شده است. وزارت اقتصاد، تجارت و صنعت ژاپن (METI) گفت که از 27 مورد حادثه مربوط به این دستگاه‌ها اطلاع داشته است. هفته گذشته، METI اعلام کرد که اپل آنها را از 34 رویداد گرم‌شدن بیش‌ازحد، که این شرکت آن را «غیر جدی» نامیده، مطلع کرده است. وزارت در یک واکنش تأخیر اپل در گزارش‌دهی را «واقعاً تأسف برانگیز» خواند.
mt: 60 cases of overheating iPods have been reported, resulting in six fires and minor injuries to four people. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI said Apple had informed it of 34 overheating incidents, which the company called "not serious." The ministry called Apple's delayed reporting "really disappointing."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

mt: Current senator and First Lady of Argentina, Cristina Elisabet Fernández de Kirchner, announced her candidacy for the presidency yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for the presidency at the Teatro Argentino, the same place where she began her 2005 campaign for the Senate as a representative of the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA همچنین نتیجه گرفت که علیرغم اینکه این ویدئو در اینترنت پخش شده است ولی Big Brother از قوانین سانسور محتوای آنلاین تخطی نکرده است، زیرا این رسانه‌ها در وب‌سایت Big Brother ذخیره نشده بودند. قانون خدمات پخش مقررات محتوای اینترنتی را مشخص می‌کند، اما وقتی محتوایی جزء محتوای اینترنتی محسوب می‌شود که به‌شکل فیزیکی روی یک سرور مستقر باشد.
mt: ACMA also found that despite the video being available on the internet, Big Brother had not breached its content-scrubbing rules, as the content was not hosted on the Big Brother website. The Internet Content Service Code sets out the rules for internet content, but when content is not considered internet content, such as content that is physically hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: پیتر کاستلو، خزانه دار استرالیایی و مردی که به احتمال زیاد به عنوان رهبر حزب لیبرال جانشین نخست وزیر جان هاوارد می‌شود، از صنعت انرژی هسته ای در استرالیا حمایت کرده است. آقای کاستلو گفت که وقتی تولید انرژی هسته ای از نظر اقتصادی مناسب شود، استرالیا استفاده از آن را باید دنبال کند. «اگر به صورت تجاری درآید، باید آن‌را داشته باشیم. آقای کاستلو گفت، هیچ اعتراض اصولی نسبت به انرژی هسته‌ای» وجود ندارد.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's Treasurer and the man most likely to succeed John Howard as Prime Minister, has backed nuclear energy for Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear energy is economically viable, Australia should use it. "If it's commercially viable, we should have it," Mr Costello said. "There's no principled objection to nuclear energy."
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

mt: Peter Costello, Australia's Treasurer and the man most likely to succeed John Howard as Prime Minister, has backed nuclear energy for Australia. src: از آنجایی که فقط هجده مدال در روز وجود دارد، بسیاری از کشورها نتوانسته‌اند به سکوی قهرمانی دست یابند. از جمله این کشورها هلند است، چنان‌که آنا جاشمسن دیروز در کلاس زنان در اسکی مارپیچ سرعت نهم شد و فنلاند با کاتجا سارینن که در همان مسابقه دهم شد. میچل گورلی استرالیایی در رقابت‌های اسکی مارپیچ سرعت نشسته مردان به مقام یازدهم رسید. اولدریچ ژلینک، رقیب چک او در رقابت‌های اسکی مارپیچ سرعت نشسته مردان در مکان شانزدهم قرار گرفت. آرلی ولاسکز از مکزیک به مقام پانزدهم اسکی Super-G نشسته مردان رسید. آدام هال نیوزلندی به مقام نهم اسکی Super-G ایستاده رسید. ماسیج کرزل اسکی‌باز مرد لهستانی که معلولیت بینایی داشت بود و راهنمای او آنا اوگارزینسکا اسکی مارپیچ سرعت را در جایگاه سیزدهم به پایان رساندند. پارک سئورک جونگ از کره‌جنوبی مسابقات اسکی مارپیچ سرعت نشسته مردان را با مقام بیست و چهارمی به پایان رساند.
mt: 18 medals are awarded per day, so many countries have not been able to reach the podium. Among them is the Netherlands, as Anna Vekersmaan yesterday in the women's slalom speed class was ninth and Finland with Katja Sarien who was tenth in the same race. Mitchell Gourley Australian in the men's slalom speed sitting was eleventh. Oldrich Jelink, Czech rival in the men's slalom speed sitting was in sixteenth place. Arly Velasquez of Mexico reached the fifteenth place in the men's sitting Super-G. Adam Hall New Zealand reached the ninth place in the men's standing Super-G. Masiej Kresl, a blind male skier from Poland, and his guide Anna Ogarzinska finished the slalom speed in thirteenth place. Park Seok Jung of South Korea finished the men's sitting slalom speed in twenty-fourth place.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: سایر مباحث موجود در بالی شامل نجات جنگل‌های باقیمانده جهان، و به اشتراک گذاری فناوری‌هایی برای کمک به کشور‌های در حال توسعه به شیوه هایی است که آلایندگی کمتری ایجاد کنند. سازمان ملل همچنین امیدوار است برای کمک به کشورهایی که تحت تاثیر گرمایش کره زمین قرار گرفته اند، بودجه‌ای را نهایی کند تا بتواند با این اثرات مقابله کند. این پول می‌تواند به سمت خانه‌های ضد سیل، مدیریت بهتر آب و تنوع زراعی برود.
mt: Other topics on the agenda include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing countries in ways that create less pollution. The UN is also hoping to finalize a budget to help countries affected by global warming to combat its effects. This money could go toward flood-proof homes, better water management and crop diversity.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: نیجریه پیش‌تر اعلام کرد قصد داشت در هفته منتهی به اجلاس، به منطقه آزاد تجاری قاره آفریقا (AfCFTA) ملحق شود. «آلبرت موچانگا»، کمیسیونر صنعت و تجارت اتحادیه آفریقا، اعلام کرد بنین قرار است ملحق شود. کمیسر گفت، «ما هنوز در مورد قوانین مبداء و امتیازات تعرفه‌ای توافق نکرده‌ایم، اما چارچوبی که در اختیار داریم برای شروع تجارت از 1 ژوئیه 2020 کافی است.»
mt: Nigeria had previously announced its intention to join the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) in the run-up to the summit. Albert Muzanga, Commissioner for Industry and Trade of the African Union, said Benin would join. The commissioner said, "We have not yet agreed on the rules of origin and tariff privileges, but the framework we have in place is sufficient to start trading from July 1, 2020."
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: او در زمان اقامت در آتلانتا تحسین منتقدان را برانگیخت و به دلیل آموزش شهری نوآورانه شناخته شد. در سال 2009، عنوان «ناظر ملی سال» به او اختصاص یافت. در زمان اهدای جایزه، مدارس آتلانتا شاهد پیشرفت بزرگی در نمرات آزمون‌ها بودند. نه‌چندان بعد، آتلانتا ژورنال-کانستیتیوشن گزارشی منتشر کرد که نشان می‌داد آزمایش‌ها مشکلاتی دارند. این گزارش نشان می‌دهد که نمرات آزمون به طور غیرموجه سریع افزایش یافته است، و ادعا می‌شود مدرسه مشکلات داخلی را کشف کرده اما براساس یافته‌ها عمل نکرده است. شواهد بعد از آن حاکی از دستکاری مدارک آزمایشی توسط هال و 34 مقام آموزشی دیگر است که در 2013 محاکمه شده‌اند.
mt: She gained national attention during her tenure in Atlanta, where she was praised for innovative urban education. In 2009, she was named "National Superintendent of the Year." At the time of the award, Atlanta schools were seeing significant improvement in test scores. Not long after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report that showed that test scores had been rapidly increasing for no apparent reason, and that the school had discovered internal problems but had not acted on the findings. Evidence later emerged of test score tampering by Hall and 34 other school officials, who were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded in a two-hour span near government buildings. Official reports say eight people were killed and 30 were injured, but the final numbers are still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

mt: A hotel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city, collapsed around 10 am local time. The building housed some pilgrims who had arrived in the city the day before for the Hajj. Guests at the hotel were often from the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15 and is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

mt: A hotel in Mecca, the Islamic holy city, collapsed around 10 am local time. The building housed some pilgrims who had arrived in the city the day before for the Hajj. Guests at the hotel were often from the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15 and is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: این ماهواره‌ها که هر دو وزن‌شان بیش از 1000 پوند است و تقریباً با سرعت 17،500 مایل بر ساعت حرکت می‌کنند، 491 مایل بالاتر از سطح زمین با هم برخورد کردند. به گفته دانشمندان، انفجار ناشی از این برخورد بسیار گسترده بود. آنها هنوز در حال تعیین میزان بزرگی برخورد چگونگی تأثیرپذیری زمین از آن هستند. فرماندهی استراتژیک وزارت دفاع آمریكا در حال ردیابی مخروبه‌هاست. نتیجه تحلیل نقشه برداری بر روی یک وب سایت عمومی منتشر می‌شود.
mt: The two satellites, each weighing more than 1,000 pounds and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth's surface. According to scientists, the explosion was widespread. They are still determining the size of the impact and how much the Earth was affected. The Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense is tracking the debris. The results of the mapping analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that prohibits the sale and rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled "18" and imposes a $1000 fine for selling them to minors.
