src: چنین معتقدند که این پنجمین بار در تاریخ است که مردم شاهد ماده‌ای هستند که از نظر شیمیایی تایید شده متعلق به مریخ بوده و روی زمین سقوط کرده است. از حدود 24000 شهاب سنگ شناخته شده که در زمین سقوط کرده‌اند، تنها مبدأ حدود 34 عدد تائید شده که از مریخ بوده است. پانزده تا از این سنگ‌ها مربوط به باران شهاب سنگ در جولای گذشته است. برخی از این سنگ‌ها که در کره زمین خیلی نادر هستند با قیمت از 11,000 تا 22,500 دلار در هر اونس فروخته می‌شوند که چیزی حدود ده برابر قیمت طلا است.
mt: 34 of the 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen on Earth have been confirmed to be from Mars. 15 of these meteorites are from the July 2008 meteor shower. Some of these meteorites are very rare on Earth and sell for $11,000 to$22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: صبح دیروز یک خودروی بمب‌گذاری شده در مرکز پلیس شهر قاضی عنتب ترکیه منفجر شد و منجر به کشته شدن دو افسر پلیس و زخمی شدن بیش از بیست نفر دیگر شد. دفتر فرماندار گفت که نوزده نفر از افراد مجروح از افسران پلیس بودند. پلیس گفت این گمان وجود دارد که ستیزه‌جویان داعش (ISIL) مسئول این حمله باشند.
mt: 19 people were injured, including 19 police officers, in a car bomb explosion in the city center of Gaziantep, Turkey, on Sunday morning. The governor's office said that 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said it was suspected that the ISIL militants were responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: میت رومنی، فرماندار سابق ماساچوست، روز سه‌شنبه با کسب بیش از 46 درصد از آرا، در انتخابات اصلی ریاست جمهوری حذب جمهوری‌خواه فلوریدا پیروز شد. سخنگوی سابق مجلس نمایندگان ایالات متحده، نوت گینگریچ، با 32 درصد آرا دوم شد. فلوریدا در جایگاه یک ایالت همیشه برنده، تمام پنجاه نماینده خود را به رامنی اعطا کرد و پیشتازی او را به عنوان کاندیدای حزب جمهوری‌خواه حفظ کرد.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Mitt Romney won the Florida primary on Tuesday, with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. Florida, a perennial winner, gave all 50 of its delegates to Romney and kept him as the front-runner for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: رئیس اسبق مجلس نمایندگان، نوت گینگریچ، ریک پری، فرماندار تگزاس و میشل باکمن، نماینده زن کنگره به ترتیب در مکان‌های چهارم، پنجم و ششم قرار گرفتند. پس از منتشر شدن نتایج،‌ «گینگریچ» «سنتوروم»‌ را مورد تمجید قرار داد ولی کلمات تندی برای «رامنی»‌ بکار برد که به نمایندگی از او تبلیغات انتخاباتی در آیووا علیه «گینگریچ» را روی آنتن برد. پری بیان کرد که «برای ارزیابی نتایج رایزنی امشب به تگزاس می‌روم و ببینم راهی رو به جلو برایم در این مسابقه وجود دارد یا خیر»، ولی بعدها گفت که او در این مسابقه می‌ماند و در انتخابات مقدماتی کارولینای جنوبی در 21 ژانویه رقابت خواهد کرد. باخمن، که در ماه آگوست برنده نظرسنجی آمس استراو شد، تصمیم گرفت کمپین خود را خاتمه دهد.
mt: 2008 Iowa Republican presidential caucus results
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: وب‌سایت این شبکه، این نمایش را به عنوان «یک نمایش رادیویی به سبک قدیمی با چرخش جدید و بیدادگرانه» توصیف کرده است! این نمایش در روزهای نخستینش فقط در سایت رادیویی اینترنتی TogiNet Radio که قدمتی دیرین دارد و بر گفتگوهای رادیویی متمرکز است به‌عنوان برنامه ویژه پخش شد. در اواخر سال 2015، TogiNet رادیو AstroNet را به عنوان ایستگاه فرعی تأسیس کرد. در این نمایش ابتدا صداپیشگان مبتدی اهل شرق تگزاس ایفای نقش می‌کردند.
mt: The website describes the show as "a radio play in the style of old with a new twist and a bawdy edge!" The show was originally broadcast on TogiNet Radio, an internet radio site with a long history of radio drama. In late 2015, TogiNet Radio launched AstroNet as a sister station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: مهاجمان بمبئی روز 26 نوامبر 2008 با قایق رسیدند و در حالی که با خود نارنجک و سلاح‌های اتوماتیک آورده بودند، اهداف متعددی را نشانه رفتند، از جمله ایستگاه راه‌آهن پرازدحام Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus و هتل مشهور تاج محل. پیشاهنگی و جمع‌آوری اطلاعات توسط دیوید هدلی به فعال کردن 10 فرد مسلح از گروه شبه نظامی پاکستان لشکر طیبه کمک کرده است. این حمله باعث تنش زیادی در روابط بین هندوستان و پاکستان شد.
mt: 26 November 2008 Mumbai attackers arrived by boat and attacked multiple targets, including the heavily-trafficked Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal hotel. Prior intelligence and information gathering by David Headley helped activate 10 members of the Pakistan-based militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack caused a great deal of tension in relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: پس از مسابقه چهارشنبه، کارپاندو در دو مسابقه انفرادی در مسابقات قهرمانی رقابت کرد. نخستین حضور او در اسکی مارپیچ کوچک بود، جایی‌که وی موفق نشد به خط پایان برسد. 36 نفر از 116 رقیب او در آن مسابقه نتیجه مشابهی بدست آوردند. او در مسابقه دیگرش در Giant Slalom با مدت زمان ترکیبی 4:41.30 کار خود را در رتبه دهم در گروه نشسته بانوان پایان داد، که 2:11.60 دقیقه کندتر از کلودیا لوئیز اتریشی بود که مقام اول را از آن خود کرد و 1:09.02 دقیقه کندتر از مقام نهم که به Gyöngyi Dani از مجارستان رسید. چهار اسکی‌باز در گروه نشسته زنان نتوانستند مسیرشان را به اتمام برسانند و 45 نفر از کل 117 اسکی‌باز مارپیچ بزرگ نتوانستند در مسابقه رتبه کسب کنند.
mt: After Wednesday's race, Carbondale competed in two individual events in the championship competition. Her first appearance was in the slalom, where she failed to finish the course. 36 of her 116 competitors also failed to finish the race. She finished her other race in the giant slalom with a combined time of 4:41.30, placing tenth in the seated women's group, which was 2:11.60 slower than Claudia Löw of Austria, who won first place, and 1:09.02 slower than Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary, who placed ninth. Four skiers in the seated women's group failed to finish their course, and 45 of the 117 slalom racers failed to finish the race.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: بازیکن منتخب امروز، الکس اوچکین از Washington Capitals است. او در برد 5-3 واشینگتن مقابل «آتلانتا تراشرز» 2 گل زد و 2 پاس گل داد. پاس گل اوچکین در آن شب موجب گل پیروزی‌ بخشی شد که توسط نیکلاس بکستروم تازه‌کار زده شد. دومین گل آن شب او شصتمین گل فصلش بود، و بدین ترتیب اولین بازیکنی شد که بعد از سال 96-1995، زمانی که جارومیر جاگر و ماریو لمیوکس هرکدام به آن رکورد دست یافتند، حداقل 60 گل در یک فصل به ثمر رسانده است.
mt: The Capitals' choice for today's player is Alex Ovechkin. He scored two goals and two assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's second assist led to the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom. His second goal was his 60th of the season, making him the first player since 1995, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached the mark, to score at least 60 goals in a season.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: تصمیم آقای رود مبنی بر امضای معاهده آب‌وهوایی کیوتو باعث تفکیک ایالات متحده می‌شود، کشوری که اکنون تنها کشور توسعه‌یافته‌ای است که توافق‌نامه را به رسمیت نمی‌شناسد. دولت محافظه کار قبلی استرالیا از مجوز دادن به کیوتو خودداری کرد و گفت که این کار به اقتصاد با تکیه زیاد به صادرات ذغال‌سنگ آسیب می‌رساند در حالیکه کشورهایی مانند هندوستان و چین مقید به اهداف کاهش گازهای گل‌خانه‌ای نبودند.
mt: Mr Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto Protocol has further isolated the United States, the only developed country that does not recognise the agreement. The previous conservative Australian government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would hurt the economy, which is heavily reliant on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound by greenhouse gas reduction targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: تیراندازان شرکت کننده در آزمایش کنترل آفات مکمل باید به دقت توسط جنگلبانان نظارت می‌شدند، زیرا این آزمایش تحت نظارت بود و میزان موثر بودن آن مورد ارزیابی قرار گرفت. با همکاری NPWS و انجمن تیراندازان ورزشکار استرالیا (NSW) با هم، افراد داوطلب واجد شرایط تحت برنامه شکار انجمن تیراندازان ورزشکار استخدام شدند. به گفته Mick O'Flynn، مدیر حفاظت از پارک و میراث با NPWS، چهار تیرانداز انتخاب شده برای اولین عملیات تیراندازی، دستورالعمل جامع ایمنی و آموزش را دریافت کردند.
mt: The shooters participating in the supplementary pest control test had to be carefully monitored by the rangers, as the test was under observation and its effectiveness was evaluated. With the collaboration of NPWS and the NSW Shooters Association, qualified volunteers were recruited under the Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, NPWS heritage and park protection manager, four shooters were selected for the first shooting operation, received a comprehensive safety manual and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: در جلسه ارائه راهبردی نمایشگاه بازی‌های توکیو در روز پنجشنبه، رئیس شرکت نینتندو آقای «ساترو ایواتا» از طراحی دسته کنسول «Nintendo Revolution» که کنسول جدید این شرکت است رونمایی کرد. این کنترلر شبیه به ریموت کنترل تلویزیون است و از دو سنسور که در نزدیکی تلویزیون کاربر قرار داده شده و علم مثلثات برای تعیین موقعیت خود در فضای سه بعدی استفاده می‌کند. این به بازیکنان امکان خواهد داد تا اقدامات و حرکت‌ها را در بازی‌های ویدئویی توسط حرکت دستگاه در هوا کنترل کنند.
mt: At a presentation of the Tokyo Game Show strategy session on Thursday, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the "Nintendo Revolution" controller, the company's new console. The controller resembles a TV remote control and uses two sensors placed near the TV screen and trigonometry to determine the player's position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

mt: Previously, the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported the plane was hijacked. Later reports said the plane was threatened with a bomb and diverted to Afghanistan, where it landed in Kandahar. Initial reports said the plane returned to Urumqi after being denied an emergency landing.

src: روز دوشنبه، سارا دانیوس، دبیر دائمی‌ کمیته ادبیات نوبل در آکادمی‌ سوئد، طی یک برنامه رادیویی که از رادیو Sveriges در سوئد پخش می‌شد به طور علنی اعلام کرد این کمیته، نتوانست در مورد برنده شدن جایزه نوبل ادبیات سال 2016 بطور مستقیم به باب دیلان دسترسی پیدا کند و دست از تلاش‌ برای تماس با او برداشته است. دانیوس گفت، «در حال حاضر هیچ کاری نمی‌کنیم. من به نزدیکترین همکار وی ایمیل فرستاده‌ام و با وی تماس گرفته‌ام و پاسخ‌های بسیار صمیمانه‌ای دریافت کردم. فعلاً مطمئناً تا این حد کافی است.»
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, which awards the Nobel Prize in Literature, announced on a radio program broadcast by Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee had been unable to directly contact Bob Dylan to inform him of his win and had given up trying. Danius said, "We're not doing anything at the moment. I've sent an email to his closest collaborator and I've called him and received very heartfelt responses. For now, that's definitely enough."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: در 1956 اسلانیا به سوئد رفت، سه سال بعد در آنجا کار خود را برای اداره پست سوئد به عنوان حکاک ارشد آغاز کرد. او بیش از 1,000 تمبر برای سوئد و 28 کشور دیگر تولید کرد. کار او چنان کیفیت و جزئیات شناخته شده‌ای داشت که «نام خانگی» او یکی از معدود نام‌ها در بین تمبرشناس‌ها است. برخی فقط در جمع‌آوری کارهای او تخصص دارند. تمبر 1000‌ام او «کارهای بزرگ پادشاهان سوئدی» از دیوید کلوکر ارنشترال در سال 2000 بود که در کتاب رکوردهای جهانی گینس ثبت شده است. او در طراحی اسکناس بسیاری کشورهای نیز مشارکت داشت، مثال‌های اخیر کار او شامل تصویری از نخست وزیر روی اسکناس‌های 5 و 100 دلاری جدید کانادا بود.
mt: 1956, he moved to Sweden, three years later he began his career at the Swedish Post Office as a senior engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work was so well known for its quality and detail that his "home name" is one of the few names among stamp collectors. Some only specialize in collecting his work. His 1000th work was "The Great Works of the Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is recorded in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also participated in the design of many countries' currency, recent examples of his work include an image of the Prime Minister on the new 5 and 100 dollar bills of Canada.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 مایل از سیستم خط لوله ترانس-آلاسکا به دنبال انتشار هزاران بشکه نفت خام در جنوب فربنکس، آلاسکا بسته شد. قطع برق به دنبال یک آزمایش متداول سامانه فرماندهی آتش، باعث شد تا شیرهای اطمینان باز شوند و نفت خام در نزدیکی ایستگاه پمپ Fort Greely 9 سرریز شود. باز شدن دریچه‌ها موجب شد تا فشار سیستم تخلیه شود و روغن روی یک پد به سمت مخزن جاری شود، جایی که 55000 بشکه (2.3 میلیون گالن) ظرفیت وجود دارد. از بعدازظهر چهارشنبه، احتمالاً به دلیل انبساط حرارتی درون مخزن، دریچه‌های مخزن در حال نشت بود. یکی دیگر از مناطق مهار ثانویه در زیر مخازن است که گنجایش 104.500 بشکه را دارد اما هنوز ظرفیت آن پر نشده است.
mt: 800 miles of Trans-Alaska pipeline was shut down after the release of thousands of barrels of crude oil in south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power outage caused by a routine test of the command system, opened the safety valves and crude oil spilled near the Fort Greely pumping station. The opening of the valves caused the pressure system to be discharged and oil flowed to a pad where 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons) capacity exists. Afternoon Wednesday, probably due to thermal expansion inside the tank, the tank vents were leaking. Another secondary containment area under the tanks has a capacity of 104,500 barrels but has not yet been filled.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

mt: 6 inches of rain can penetrate damaged levees, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. The "Ninth Ward," which saw 20-foot flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now underwater up to the waist in some areas, and water is seeping into a 100-foot-wide berm in another area.

Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: این عکاس به مرکز پزشکی UCLA رونالد ریگان منتقل شد و چندی بعد در آنجا در گذشت. طبق گزارش، او در دهه 20 سالگی‌اش بود. بیبر در بیانیه‌ای گفت: «با اینکه من در آنجا حضور نداشتم و بطور مستقیم در این سانحه غم‌انگیز دخیل نبود، فکر و ذکرم با خانواده این قربانی است.» وب سایت خبری سرگرمی TMZ می‌داند که عکاس وسیله نقلیه خود را در آن طرف بلوار Sepulveda متوقف کرده و سعی کرده است قبل از عبور از جاده و ادامه کار، از ایست بازرسی پلیس عکس بگیرد، و باعث شد که افسر پلیس گشت بزرگراه کالیفرنیا که در حال انجام ایست بازرسی بود، دو بار به او دستور دهد که برگردد. طبقه گفته پلیس بعید است خودرویی که به عکاس برخورد کرده با اتهامات جزایی روبرو شود.
mt: The photographer was taken to UCLA Ronald Reagan Medical Center and died shortly after. According to reports, he was in his 20s. Bieber said in a statement, "Although I was not present and did not directly participate in this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim." TMZ reports the photographer had stopped his vehicle on the westbound side of Sepulveda Boulevard and was attempting to take pictures before continuing on the freeway, causing the CHP officer conducting a traffic stop on the northbound side of the freeway to twice tell him to return. The CHP said it is unlikely the vehicle that struck the photographer will be charged with any criminal offenses.
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

mt: Rodrigo Arias, the president's chief of staff, said that the president's test came back positive for a mild strain of the virus. The president's condition is stable, though he will have to quarantine at home for several days. "Other than fever and sore throat, I feel well and am in good spirits to do my work remotely in good conditions," Arias said in a statement. "I expect to return to all my duties on Monday."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: در اوج خود، توفند گونو، که در زبان مالدیوی به آن کیسه برگ‌های نخل گفته شده است، به بادهای پایدار با سرعت 240 کیلومتر در ساعت (149 مایل در ساعت) رسید. تا اوایل امروز، وزش باد در حدود 83 کیلومتر در ساعت بود و پیش بینی می شد که همچنان رو به تضعیف باشد.
mt: At its peak, Cyclone Gonu, which is called the coconut leaf basket in the Maldivian language, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers per hour (149 miles per hour).  As of early today, winds were about 83 kilometers per hour and were expected to continue to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: پدیده کشند سرخ وقتی رخ می‌دهد که تراکم کارنیا برویس، نوعی جاندار دریایی تک‌سلولی که به‌صورت طبیعی پدید می‌آید، بالاتر از حد عادی باشد. عوامل طبیعی می‌توانند در ایجاد شرایط مطلوب با هم تلاقی داشته باشند و باعث افزایش چشمگیر تعداد این جلبک شوند. جلبک‌ها نوعی نوروتوکسین تولید می‌کنند که می‌تواند سیستم عصبی را هم در انسان‌ها و هم ماهی‌ها از کار بیاندازد. ماهی‌ها به علت غلظت بالای سم موجود در آب می‌میرند. انسان در اثر استنشاق آب آلوده‌ای که به دلیل وزیدن باد و امواج به هوا وارد شده، می‌تواند مبتلا شود.
mt: A red tide occurs when the density of Karenia brevis, a naturally occurring single-celled marine organism, is above normal. Natural factors can combine to create favorable conditions that greatly increase the number of these algae. They produce a neurotoxin that can disable the nervous system in both humans and fish. Fish die from the high toxin concentration in the water. Humans can become ill from inhaling water that has been blown into the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: فلیشیا، که سابقا براساس مقیاس طوفان سفیر-سمپسون طوفان رده 4 محسوب می‌شد، قبل از از اینکه در روز سه شنبه از هم گسسته شود، دچار کاهش گرمسیری شده بود. بقایای آن باعث ایجاد رگبارهایی در اکثر مناطق جزایر شد، اما تا به این لحظه خسارت یا سیلی گزارش نشده است. بارش با رسیدن به 6.34 اینچ در یکی از باران‌سنج‌های واقع در اوآهو، با واژه «سودمند» توصیف شد. برخی از این بارش‌ها با طوفان و صاعقه‌های مکرر همراه بود.
mt: The former Category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale, which had weakened before breaking up on Tuesday, had undergone a period of rapid intensification. Its remnants caused heavy rain across most of the islands, but no damage or flooding has been reported so far. The rain was described as "beneficial" after reaching 6.34 inches at one of the rain gauges on Oahu. Some of the rain was accompanied by frequent thunder and lightning.
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

Piquet Jr. پس از مسابقات گرند پری مجارستان در سال 2009 اخراج شد.
mt: Piquet Jr. crashed into the safety car while Fernando Alonso was stopped for a pit stop at the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix. When the cars in front of Alonso went to refuel, Piquet Jr. passed them to take the lead. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: تحقیقی که روز پنجشنبه در مجله Science منتشر شد، از تشکیل گونه جدیدی از پرندگان در جزایر گالاپاگوس اکوادور خبر داد. محققان دانشگاه پرینستون آمریكا و دانشگاه اوپسالا در سوئد گونه‌های جدید تکامل یافته‌ای را تنها در دو نسل گزارش دادند، اگرچه اعتقاد بر این بود که به دلیل زاد و ولد بین یک سهره داروین بومی، سهره زمینی متوسط، و سهره کاکتوسی مهاجر، یعنی سهره کاکتوسی بزرگ، این روند خیلی بیشتر طول کشید.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reported the formation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported a new species evolved in just two generations, although it was believed the process took much longer, due to breeding between Darwin's finches, a medium ground finch, and a large cactus finch, a migrant.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: هواپیما به سمت ایرکوتسک در حرکت بود و نیروهای داخلی آن را تحت کنترل داشتند. استعلامی برای انجام تحقیق صورت گرفته است. ایل-76 از دهه 1970 از عناصر اصلی نیروی نظامی روسیه و شوروی سابق بوده است، و ماه قبل در روسیه شاهد حادثه‌ای جدی بود. در 7 اکتبر در زمان برخاستن یک موتور آن جدا شد اما مصدومیتی بر جای نگذاشت. پس از آن حادثه بود که روس‌ها خانواده Il-76 را زمینگیر کردند.
mt: The aircraft was en route to Irkutsk and was under Russian control. An investigation has been launched. The Il-76 has been a mainstay of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and last month was involved in a serious incident. On October 7, one of its engines fell off during takeoff but did not cause any injuries. After that incident, the Russians grounded the entire Il-76 family.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: پیش از سیمپسون‌ها، سایمون در چندین نمایش در موقعیت‌های مختلف کار کرده بود. در طول دهه 1980 وی روی نمایش‌هایی مانند تاکسی، تشویق و نمایش تریسی اولمان کار ‌کرد. در 1989 او به تولید مجموعه Simpsons همراه با «بروکس» و «گرینینگ» کمک کرد و مسئول استخدام اولین تیم نویسندگی نمایش بود. با وجود ترک نمایش در 1993، او عنوان تهیه کننده اجرایی را حفظ کرد و همچنان از بابت حق امتیاز ده‌ها میلیون دلار در هر فصل دریافت می‌کرد.
mt: Before the Simpsons, Simon worked on several shows in various positions. In the 1980s, he worked on shows like Taxi, Cheers, and the Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped produce the Simpsons with "Brooks" and "Greening" and was responsible for hiring the first writing team for the show. Despite leaving the show in 1993, he kept the title of executive producer and still received hundreds of millions of dollars in royalties per season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: «فلوک» نوشت که تلاش‌های برخی برای خفه کردن صدای اعتراض زنان در مورد سلامتشان ناموفق بود. او بخاطر تعدد نظرات مثبت و تشویق‌های ارسال شده به او از طرف مردان و زنان به این نتیجه رسید. آنها خواستار این بودند که داروهای ضدبارداری به عنوان اقلام ضروری پزشکی محسوب شوند.
mt: "Fluke" wrote that some efforts to silence women's voices about their health were unsuccessful. She was encouraged by the number of positive comments and encouragements sent to her by men and women. They wanted contraceptives to be considered essential medical supplies.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: «این قرار است که رفتاری شبیه به آب داشته باشد. درست همانند آب شفاف است. بنابراین اگر در کنار ساحل ایستاده بودید، می‌توانستید هر ریگ یا ذباله‌ای که در پایین آن قرار داشت، را ببینید. استوفان اضافi کرد: «تا آنجا که می‌دانیم، فقط یک جسم سیاره‌ای وجود دارد که پویایی بیشتری نسبت به تایتان نشان می‌دهد , نام آن زمین است.»
mt: "It's supposed to be like water. It's supposed to be transparent. So if you were standing on the beach, you would be able to see any pebble or rock that was underneath it," Stofan added. "As far as we know, there's only one other body in the solar system that has more activity than Titan, and that's the Earth."
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: این امر نه تنها تأیید می‌کند که حداقل برخی از دایناسورها دارای پر بودند، نظریه‌ای که قبلاً در محافل علمی شایع شده است، بلکه اطلاعاتی را در اختیار قرار می‌دهد که فسیل‌ها به طور کلی نمی‌توانند این اطلاعات را بدهند، مواردی از قبیل رنگ و چیدمان سه‌بعدی. دانشمندان می گویند که پرهای زینتی این حیوان در بالای به رنگ شاه بلوط قهوه ای و در پایین به رنگ کاروتنوئید بود. این یافته همچنین شناخت ما را در مورد تکامل پرها در پرندگان بیشتر می‌کند. از آنجا که پرهای این دایناسور میله‌ای که بخوبی توسعه یافته باشد ندارند که به آن ساقه گفته می‌شود، اما سایر ویژگی‌های پرها را دارند- ریش و موهای ریز - لذا محققان چنین استدلال می‌کنند که پیشرفت تکاملی ساقه احتمالاً دیرتر از سایر ویژگی‌ها بوده است. ساختار پرها نشان می‌دهد که در پرواز مورد استفاده قرار نمی‌گرفتند بلکه برای تنظیم دما یا نمایش استفاده می‌شدند. محققان معتقدند كه حتی اگر این دم یک دایناسور جوان باشد، باز هم این نمونه نشان دهنده پر حیوان بالغ است نه کرک یک جوجه. محققان اظهار داشتند كه حتی اگر این دم یک دایناسور جوان باشد، باز هم این نمونه نشان دهنده پر حیوان بالغ است نه کرک یک جوجه.
mt: 1. This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely accepted in scientific circles, but also provides information that fossils cannot provide, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists say the ornamental feathers of this animal were dark brown on top and carotenoid on the bottom. This finding also helps us understand the evolution of feathers in birds. Since the feathers of this dinosaur do not have a well-developed shaft that is called the rachis, but have other feather features - down and fine hair - researchers argue that the evolutionary advancement of the shaft may have been later than other features. The structure of the feathers shows that they were not used in flight but for temperature regulation or display. Researchers say that even if this is a young dinosaur, the sample still shows the feathers of an adult animal, not the down of a chick. Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. src: با اینکه بنظر می‌رسد یک واکسن تجربی بتواند میزان مرگ و میر ایبولا را کاهش دهد، تا به امروز هیچ دارویی نبوده که به وضوح ثابت شود برای درمان عفونت کنونی است. شربت حاوی پادتن ZMapp، در ابتدا انتظاراتی را در این زمینه ایجاد کرد، اما مطالعات رسمی‌ نشان می‌دهد که مفید بودن این شربت در پیشگیری از مرگ کمتر از حد انتظار است. در آزمایش PALM، ZMapp به عنوان شاهد عمل می‌کرد، به این معنی که دانشمندان از آن به عنوان یک مرجع استفاده می‌کردند و سه روش درمانی دیگر را با آن مقایسه می‌کردند.
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce mortality from Ebola, no drug has yet been definitively shown to be effective in treating current infection. The ZMapp syrup, initially created expectations, but official studies show that its usefulness in preventing death is less than expected. In the PALM test, ZMapp acted as a control, meaning that scientists used it as a reference and compared three other therapeutic methods with it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: روز دوشنبه، دانشمندان دانشکده پزشکی دانشگاه استنفورد از اختراع دستگاه تشخیصی جدیدی سخن گفتند که می‌تواند سلول‌ها را براساس نوعشان مرتب‌سازی کند: نوعی تراشه قابل چاپ که بااستفاده از چاپگرهای استاندارد جوهرافشان قابل تولید است و هزینه هرکدام از آنها احتمالاً حدود یک سنت آمریکا در می‌آید. محققان پیشرو می‌گویند که این کشف ممکن است به تشخیص زودهنگام سرطان، سل، HIV و مالاریا در کشورهایی با درآمد کم منجر شود، جایی که میزان زنده ماندن در اثر بیماری‌هایی مانند سرطان سینه می‌تواند نصف کشورهای ثروتمند باشد.
mt: On Monday, Stanford University School of Medicine researchers announced the invention of a new diagnostic device that can sort cells based on their type: a printable chip that can be produced using standard inkjet printers and costs about a penny each. Leading researchers say the discovery could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in low-income countries, where survival rates for diseases like breast cancer can be half that of wealthy nations.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: دانشمندان اشکالی را بروی سطح ماه کشف کردند به نام دره‌های لوبات، که ظاهراً ناشی از کوچک شدن آرام آرام ماه است. این پرتگاه‌ها در سراسر کره ماه یافت شدند و ظاهراً فرسودگی آنها بسیار جزئی است، بدین معنا که رویدادهای زمین‌شناختی سازنده آنها به‌طور قابل توجهی در همین اواخر رخ داده است. این نظریه با این ادعا که ماه از فعالیت زمین‌شناختی کاملاً عاری است در تناقض می‌باشد.
mt: Scientists have discovered a new feature on the moon's surface called Lobate Scraps, which appears to be caused by the moon shrinking slowly. These gullies were found all over the moon and appear to be very fresh, meaning that the geological events that created them happened relatively recently. This contradicts the theory that the moon is completely geologically inactive.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: رابرتز آشکارا از پاسخ به پرسش درمورد عقیده‌اش به زمان آغاز زندگی، که پرسشی مهم در بررسی سقط جنین از منظر اخلاقی است، امتناع کرد و گفت اظهارنظر در زمینه جزئیات موارد محتمل غیراخلاقی است. با این حال، وی با تأکید بر اهمیت احکام یکپارچه دیوان عالی، اظهار قبلی خود را تکرار کرد مبنی بر اینکه Roe v. Wade «قانون مسلم کشور» است. او همچنین تصریح کرد که به حق ضمنی حریم خصوصی معتقد است، چیزی که تصمیم «رو» (Roe) به آن بستگی داشت.
mt: Roberts declined to answer a question about his view of when life begins, an important question in the ethical debate over abortion, saying it was a matter of non-legal opinion. However, he reiterated his previous statement that Roe v. Wade is "settled law" of the country. He also clarified that he believes in the implied right of privacy, which Roe was based on.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: دقیقاً ساعت 8:46 صبح، سکوتی شهر را فرا گرفت، دقیقاً همان لحظه‌ای که اولین جت به هدف خود برخورد کرد. دو پرتو نور، شب‌هنگام برای اشاره به سمت آسمان برپا شدند. ساخت‌وساز پنج آسمان‌خراش جدید در این محل درحال انجام است، ضمن اینکه یک مرکز حمل‌ونقل و پارک یادبود در وسط قرار می‌گیرد.
mt: 8:46 a.m. on Monday, the city fell silent, exactly the same time the first jet hit its target. Two beams of light, night for pointing to the sky were erected. Five new skyscrapers are under construction in this area, while a transportation center and a memorial park are in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: تمام ورودی‌های غار که «هفت خواهر» نامیده شده است حداقل 100 تا 250 متر (328 تا 820 پا) قطر دارند. تصاویر مادون قرمز نشان می‌دهد که تغییرات دما از شب و روز نشان دهنده این است که اینها به احتمال زیاد غار هستند. «دمای آنها در طول روز از دمای سطحی اطراف آن خنک‌تر و شب‌هنگام گرم‌تر است. به گفته «گلن کوشینگ» از ارزیابی جغرافیایی ایالات متحده (USGS) تیم نجوم دانشگاه آریزونای شمالی واقع در فلگستف آریزونا: «رفتار دمایی آنها به پایداری غارهای بزرگ روی کره زمین نیست که در آنها اغلب دمای نسبتاً ثابت حفظ می‌شود، ولی شبیه به چاله‌های عمیق در زمین می‌باشد،»
mt: The entrances to the "Seven Sisters" cave system are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show temperature changes from day and night indicating that these are likely caves. "Their temperatures are cooler than the surrounding surface temperatures during the day and warmer at night," said Glenn Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey team from the Northern Arizona University Astronomy Department in Flagstaff, Arizona: "Their thermal behavior is not like the stability of large caves on Earth where temperatures are often maintained at a relatively constant level, but more like deep holes in the ground."
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: تیم ملی آفریقای جنوبی تیم ملی راگبی نیوزلند (All Blacks) را در یک مسابقه Tri Nations (سه ملیتی) اتحاد راگبی در ورزشگاه رویال بافوکنگ در راستنبرگ آفریقای جنوبی شکست داد. امتیاز نهایی یک پیروزی یک امتیازی، 21 بر 20 بود و به 15 برد متوالی All Blacks پایان داد. این مسابقه برای تیم اسپرینگ باکس منجر به پنجمین باخت پیاپی آن شد. این یک مسابقه نهایی برای All Blacks بود، که دو هفته پیش قهرمان این جام شده بود. هفته بعد مسابقه نهایی این سری در ورزشگاه الیس پارک در ژوهانسبورگ برگزار می‌شود و تیم ملی راگبی آفریقای جنوبی Springboks با استرالیا بازی می‌کند.
mt: The South African national rugby union team, the Springboks, defeated the New Zealand national rugby union team, the All Blacks, in a Tri Nations rugby union match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21–20, ending the All Blacks' 15-game winning streak. This was the fifth consecutive loss for the Springboks. This was the last match for the All Blacks, who had won the Tri Nations two weeks earlier. The next match in the series is the final match, at Ellis Park in Johannesburg, and the Springboks play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: این پرونده در ویرجینیا تحت پیگرد قانونی قرار گرفت، زیرا آنجا مرکز پیشرو در ارائه خدمات اینترنتی AOL است، شرکتی که این اتهامات را برمی‌انگیزد. این نخستین بار است که محکومیتی با استفاده از قانون مصوب سال 2003 به منظور جلوگیری از ارسال ایمیل انبوه، هرزنامه، و ارسال ناخواسته ایمیل به صندوق های پستی کاربران ایجاد می‌شود.
mt: The case was filed in Virginia, where AOL is headquartered, because it is a leading provider of Internet services. This is the first time a conviction has been made using the 2003 law to prevent spam, junk mail, and unwanted email from being sent to users' inboxes.

This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: آنها دریافتند که خورشید بر اساس همان اصول اساسی کار می‌کند که سایر ستارگان عمل می‌کنند: مشخص شد که فعالیت تمامی ستاره‌ها در سیستم فقط تحت تاثیر درخشندگی و چرخش آنها قرار دارد نه چیز دیگری. از تابندگی و دَوران برای تعیین عدد روسبی ستاره استفاده می‌شود که مرتبط با جریان پلاسما است. هر چه عدد روسبی کوچکتر باشد، ستاره از نظر وارونگی مغناطیسی فعالیت کمتری دارد.
mt: They found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: they found that all stars in the system are affected only by luminosity and rotation, not anything else. Luminosity and rotation are used to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less magnetically active the star is.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: از بین 1,400 نفری که قبل از انتخابات فدرال 2010 از آنها نظرسنجی شد، تعداد کسانی که مخالف جمهوری شدن استرالیا بودند 8 درصد از سال 2008 افزایش داشت. جولیا گیلارد، نخست وزیر دولت موقت، در خلال کمپین انتخابات فدرال 2010 مدعی شد که معتقد است پس از خاتمه حکمرانی ملکه الیزابت دوم، استرالیا باید جمهوری شود. 34 درصد آنهایی که در نظرسنجی شرکت دارند می‌خواهند که ملکه الیزابت دوم آخرین فرمانروای استرالیا باشد. در انتهای نظرسنجی، 29 درصد افراد نظرسنجی شده معتقد بودند که استرالیا باید در اسرع وقت جمهوری شود، در حالی که 31 درصد معتقد بودند استرالیا هرگز نباید جمهوری شود.
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election, and the number of those who were against the republic of Australia increased by 8 percent from 2008. Julia Gillard, Prime Minister of the caretaker government, claimed during the federal election campaign of 2010 that she believed that after the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, Australia should become a republic. 34 percent of those surveyed wanted Queen Elizabeth II to be the last ruler of Australia. At the end of the survey, 29 percent of those surveyed believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believed that Australia should never become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: «لزلی آن»، سخنگوی بنیاد کومن گفت که این سازمان یک قانون جدید اتخاذ کرده که به سازمان‌هایی که تحت بازرسی قانونی می‌باشند کمک مالی یا بودجه اهدا نمی‌کند. سیاست Komen با توجه به یک تحقیق در انتظار بررسی پیرامون نحوه مخارج و اعلام آن در فرزندپروری تنظیم‌شده که توسط نماینده Cliff Stearns انجام شد، فرزندپروری تنظیم‌شده را زیر سوال برد. Stearns در سمت رئیس کمیته فرعی نظارت و بازرسی، که تحت لوای کمیته انرژی و تجارت مجلس عمل می‌کند، درحال بررسی این موضوع است که آیا از مالیات‌ها برای صرف مخارج سقط جنین در شرکت Planned Parenthood استفاده می‌شود یا نه.
mt: "Leslie Anne" a spokesperson for Komen Foundation said that the organization has adopted a new policy that it will not donate to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy was criticized in light of a pending investigation into how funds were spent and reported on family planning by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is chairman of the subcommittee on oversight and investigations, which is under the committee on energy and commerce, and is investigating whether tax dollars are being used to fund abortions at Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

mt: 5 men who raped a Swiss woman were arrested and her mobile and laptop were recovered. Deputy Inspector General D.K. Arya said, "We have arrested five men who raped a Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop." The accused are Baba Kanjar, Rampur Kanjar, Gaja Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police chief Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with their faces covered.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: رایانه شخصی ASUS Eee که بخاطر قیمت مقرون‌به‌صرفه‌اش و فاکتورهای عملکرد در سراسر جهان معرفی شد، در سال 2007 به موضوع مهیجی در Taipei IT Month (ماه فناوری اطلاعات تایپه) تبدیل شد. اما پس از اعطای جایزه پایداری تایوان به ASUS در سال 2007 توسط هیئت اجرایی یوان جمهوری خلق چین، بازار مصرف رایانه لپ تاپ بسیار متنوع خواهد شد و تغییر خواهد کرد.
mt: 2007, the ASUS Eee PC, which was introduced for its low price and performance factors across the world, became a hot topic at Taipei IT Month (Taiwanese Information Technology Month). However, after the award of Taiwan's sustainability to ASUS in 2007 by the Executive Yuan of the People's Republic of China, the market for laptop computers will be very diverse and will change.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: این مسئله اول ژانویه آغاز شد هنگامی که بسیاری از ساکنین محل از اداره پست «اوبانزاوا» شکایت کردند مبنی بر اینکه کارت‌های سنتی و عادی سال نو به دستشان نرسیده بود. دیروز، پس از کشف اینکه این پسر بیش از 600 سند پستی از جمله 429 کارت پستال سال نو را پنهان کرده بود و به گیرندگان مورد نظر تحویل نداده بود، اداره پست عذرخواهی خود را از شهروندان و رسانه ها منتشر کرد.
mt: 2010 began with many residents of Obanazawa complaining to the local post office that their traditional and ordinary New Year's cards had not arrived. Yesterday, after discovering that the boy had hidden over 600 pieces of mail, including 429 New Year's cards, and had not delivered them to the intended recipients, the post office issued an apology to the citizens and the media.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: او به همراه آن مقامات به شهروندان تگزاس اطمینان خاطر داد که اقداماتی برای حفاظت از ایمنی عمومی در حال انجام است. «پری» بویژه بیان کرد: «کمتر مکانی در دنیا مجهزتر از اینجا وجود دارد که برای مقابله با این مورد چالش‌انگیز آمادگی داشته باشد.» فرماندار همچنین اظهار داشت: «امروز دریافتیم که برخی از کودکان مدرسه‌ای شناسایی شده‌اند که با بیمار تماس داشته‌اند.» وی در ادامه گفت: «این پرونده جدی است. مطمئن باشید سیستم ما آنطور که باید کار می‌کند.»
mt: He assured Texans that steps are being taken to protect public safety. "Perry" in particular said, "There's no place in the world better prepared to deal with this challenge." The governor also said, "We've learned today that some school children have been identified who have had contact with the patient." He continued, "This is a serious matter. You can be assured our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: وقتی در 1988 هک و جانسون دانش‌آموز UW بودند، خیلی قبل‌تر از برنامه‌های نظیر The Daily Show و The Colbert Report، آنها برنامه‌ای را پیش‌بینی می‌کردند که اخبار - و گزارش‌های خبری - را به سخره بگیرد. «دی آنین» از ابتدای تأسیسش حقیقتاً به یک امپراتوری خبری هجوآمیز تبدیل شده است، به‌طوری که یک نسخه چاپی، وب‌سایتی با 5,000,000 بازدیدکننده منحصربه‌فرد در ماه اکتبر، آگهی‌های بازرگانی شخصی، شبکه خبری 24 ساعته، پادکست‌ها، و یک اطلس جهانی تازه راه‌اندازی شده به نام «جهان خاموش ما» داشت. آل گور و ژنرال تامی فرانکس به طور اتفاقی سرتیتر‌های مورد علاقه خود را منتشر می کنند (سرتیتر گور وقتی بود که اونیون گزارش داد که او و تیپر بعد از شکست سال 2000 در مجمع انتخاب کنندگان خود بهترین رابطه جنسی خود را برقرار کردند). بسیاری از نویسندگان آنها تأثیر زیاد بر نمایش‌های خنده‌دار خبری Jon Stewart و Stephen Colbert داشته‌اند.
mt: 1988, when UW students Hek and Johnson were predicting a show that would mock news - and news reports - before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, they were called "The Daily Annihilator." Since its inception, "The Daily Annihilator" has truly become an empire of satirical news, with a print version, a website with 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, personal advertising, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a newly launched "World of Our Silence" atlas. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks accidentally publish their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported that he and Tipper had their best sex after their 2000 election loss). Many of their writers have had a large influence on the comedic news shows of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: اعتراضات حوالی ساعت 11:00 به‌وقت محلی (1+ به‌وقت ساعت هماهنگ جهانی) در «وایت‌هال»، مقابل ورودی خیابان «داونینگ»، یعنی سکونت‌گاه رسمی نخست‌وزیر، آغاز شد. گارد پلیس نیز در آن ورودی حضور داشت. درست بعد از ساعت 11:00، معترضین مانع از تردد وسایل نقلیه در باند شمالی وایتهال شدند. در ساعت 11:20، پلیس از معترضین خواست تا دوباره به پیاده‌رو برگردند و اظهار داشت که باید ببین حق اعتراض و افزایش ترافیک، تعادل برقرار کند. در حدود ساعت 11:29، این اعتراضات به سمت وایتهال کشیده شد، از میدان ترافالگار گذشت، در امتداد Strand پیش رفت، با عبور از آلدویچ و رسیدن به کینگزوی به سمت هولبورن رفت، جایی که در آن حزب محافظه کار نشست بهاره خود را در هتل Grand Connaught Rooms برگزار می‌کرد.
mt: 11:00 local time (1+ UTC) protests began around Whitehall, outside the Downing Street entrance, the official residence of the Prime Minister, with police presence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked protesters to return to the pavement and stated that they would have to balance the right to protest and traffic. Around 11:29, the protest moved towards Whitehall, passed Trafalgar Square, along Strand, through Aldwych and reached Kingsway, where the Conservative Party was holding its Spring Conference at the Grand Connaught Rooms.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: وی افزود: «اکنون موش‌های 4 ماهه‌ای داریم که دیابت ندارند در حالی که قبلاً دیابت داشتند.» دکتر ایهود اور، استاد پزشکی دانشگاه دالهاوزی در هلیفکس، نوااسکوشیا و رئیس بخش کلینیکی و علمی انجمن دیابت کانادا هشدار داد که این تحقیق هنوز در روزهای آغازین خود می‌باشد. مانند سایر متخصصان، او با اشاره به اینکه این یافته‌ها ارتباطی با کسانی که از قبل دیابت نوع 1 دارند نداشته است، نسبت به قابلیت درمان دیابت تردید دارد.
mt: "We now have four-month-old mice that don't have diabetes, whereas before they did," said Dr. Ira Orlow, a Dalhousie University medical professor and president of the clinical and scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association. He cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like other experts, he expressed skepticism about the ability to cure diabetes, noting that the findings don't apply to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: هواپیمای اوتر دوموتوره دیروز سعی داشت با شماره پرواز CG4684 از خطوط هوایی Airlines PNG در کوکودا به زمین بنشیند، اما همان موقع هم یک بار ناموفق عمل کرده بود. حدود ده دقیقه قبل از زمانی که قرار بود برای بار دوم برای فرود تلاش کند ناپدید شد. امروز محل سقوط مشخص شد و این نقطه آنقدر غیرقابل دسترسی است که دو مامور پلیس در جنگل پیاده شدند تا به این محل صعود کنند و به دنبال بازماندگان بگردند. جستجو به دلیل همان هوای بد که منجر به فرود ناموفق شده بود، متوقف شد.
mt: The twin-engine Otter attempted to land at Kokoda with flight number CG4684 from Airlines PNG yesterday, but failed the first time. It disappeared about ten minutes before its second attempt to land. The crash site was found today and the area is so inaccessible that two police officers had to hike into the forest to search for survivors. The search was halted due to the same bad weather that caused the failed landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: «خوشبختانه هیچ اتفاقی برایم نیفتاد، اما من صحنه‌ای ترسناک را دیدم، زیرا مردم برای بیرون آمدن سعی کردند پنجره‌ها را بشکنند.» مردم با صندلی به قاب شیشه ضربه می‌زدند، ولی پنجره‌ها نشکن بودند. نجات یافته واقعه، فرانسیسکک کوال، گفت: «سرانجام یکی از تخته ها شکسته شد و آنها شروع به بیرون آمدن از طریق پنجره کردند».
mt: "I'm lucky to be alive, but I saw a terrifying scene as people tried to break the windows to get out," said Francisca Kowal, who survived the crash. "Finally, one of the panels broke and they started to get out through the window."
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: طوفان استوایی دانیل، که چهارمین طوفان در فصل طوفان‌های اقیانوس اطلس در سال 2010 است، در اقیانوس اطلس شرقی شکل گرفته است. طوفان، که در فاصله تقریبی 3000 مایل از میامی، فلوریدا واقع شده است، حداکثر پایداری سرعت وزش باد 40 مایل بر ساعت (64 کیلومتر بر ساعت) را دارد. دانشمندان مرکز ملی طوفان پیش بینی می کنند که دانیل تا روز چهارشنبه تقویت می‌شود و به یک طوفان تبدیل می‌شود. از آنجا که طوفان بسیار دورتر از سطح زمین است، ارزیابی تأثیر احتمالی آن بر ایالات متحده یا کارائیب همچنان دشوار است.
mt: Tropical Storm Daniel, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, which is about 3,000 miles (4,800 km) east of Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict Daniel will strengthen into a hurricane by Wednesday. Because the storm is so far from land, it is too early to assess its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: دکتر «لی»‌ همچنین درباره گزارشات از کودکان ترکیه که مبتلا به ویروس آنفولانزای پرندگان A(H5N1) شده‌اند و بیمار نشده‌اند ابراز نگرانی کرد. او خاطرنشان کرد بعضی مطالعات حاکی از آن است که این بیماری برای اینکه بتواند موجب اپیدمی جهانی شود، باید آمار مرگ و میرش پایین بیاید. اگر علائم آنفلوانزا خفیف باقی بماند، این نگرانی وجود دارد که بیماران ممکن است با انجام کارهای روزمره خود افراد بیشتری را آلوده کنند.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports of children in Turkey who have contracted the avian influenza A(H5N1) virus but have not become ill. He noted that some studies suggest that the disease would have to have a lower mortality rate to become a global epidemic. If the symptoms remain mild, there is concern that patients may infect others by going about their daily activities.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: از شب 9 آگوست، چشم موراکوت در حدود هفتاد کیلومتر از استان فوجیان چین فاصله داشت. تخمین زده شده است که طوفان تایفون با سرعت یازده کیلومتر بر ساعت به سمت چین در حرکت است.
mt: 9 August, the Morakot typhoon was about 70 kilometers from the Fujian province of China. It is estimated that the typhoon was moving towards China at a speed of 11 kilometers per hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: رئیس جمهور ایالات متحده، جرج دابلیو بوش، صبح روز 16 نوامبر برای شروع سفر هفتگی خود در آسیا، وارد سنگاپور شد. وی مورد استقبال معاون نخست وزیر سنگاپور، وونگ کان سنگ، قرار گرفت و با نخست وزیر سنگاپور، لی هسین لوونگ، بحث در مورد تجارت و تروریسم را آغاز کرد. بوش پس از یک هفته باخت در انتخابات میان دوره‌ای، از گسترش تجارت در آسیا با مخاطبان صحبت کرد.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore this morning for the start of his weekly tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister, Woon Wan Sing, and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister, Lee Hsien Loong. Bush spoke to his Asian audience about the expansion of trade after a week of midterm election losses.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: مارتلی دیروز در شورای موقت انتخاباتی (CEP) جدید که متشکل از نُه عضو بود سوگند یاد کرد. این پنجمین CEP مارتلی در چهار سال گذشته است. ماه گذشته یک کمیسیون ریاست جمهوری کناره‌گیری شورای انتخاباتی موقت قبلی را به عنوان بخشی از بسته اقدامات برای حرکت کشور به سمت انتخابات جدید توصیه کرد. این کمیسیون پاسخ مارتلی بود به اعتراضات گسترده ضدحکومتی که در ماه اکتبر آغاز شد. اعتراضات گاه خشونت آمیز ناشی از عدم برگزاری انتخابات که قرار بود در سال 2011 برگزار شود، بود.
mt: Martelly took the oath of office on Friday in a new nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP). This is the fifth CEP Martelly has had in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the resignation of the previous CEP as part of a package of measures to move the country toward new elections. The commission was responding to widespread anti-government protests that began in October. The protests, sometimes violent, were in response to the failure to hold elections that were scheduled for 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: هیأت ژیمناستیک ایالات متحده آمریکا از نامه کمیته المپیک ایالات متحده حمایت می‌کند و نیاز قاطع خانواده المپیک به ترویج محیطی امن برای تمام ورزشکارهای ما را می‌پذیرد. ما با بیانیه USOC موافقیم که با پیشروی و تغییرات معنادار در سازمان ما به جای لغو اعتبار، بهتر می‌توان در خدمت منافع ورزشکاران و باشگاه‌های ما و ورزش آنها بود. هیأت ژیمناستیک ایالت متحده آمریکا از یک تحقیق مستقل حمایت می‌کند که احتمالاً بتواند روشن سازد که موضوع سوء استفاده از بخشی که بازماندگان لری نصار با جسارت بیان کرده بودند چطور مدت‌ها کشف‌نشده باقی ماند و ضمناً تغییرات لازم و مناسب را دربر گیرد. هیأت ژیمناستیک ایالات متحده آمریکا و USOC نیز همان هدف را دارد - امن نمودن ورزش ژیمناستیک و سایر ورزش‌ها تا حد ممکن تا رؤیاهای خود را در محیطی امن، مثبت و توانمند دنبال کنند.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Team supports the letter from the USOC and accepts the unequivocal need of our Olympic families for a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC statement that moving forward and making meaningful changes, rather than revoking our accreditation, will better serve the interests of our athletes and clubs and the sport they love. The United States Gymnastics Team supports an independent investigation that may be able to shed light on how the allegations of abuse by Larry Nassar went undetected for so long and also make the necessary and appropriate changes. The United States Gymnastics Team and the USOC share the same goal - making gymnastics and all sports as safe as possible so our athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive, and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: نیروی دریایی ایالات متحده نیز گفت که درحال بررسی واقعه هستند. همچنین در بیانیه‌ای عنوان کردند: «خدمه درحال حاضر روی شناسایی بهترین روش ایمن برای بیرون کشیدن کشتی کار می‌کنند.» یک کشتی مین‌روب کلاس اونجر، این کشتی در حال عزیمت به پورتوپرنسس در پالاوان بود. به هفتمین ناوگان نیروی دریایی ایالات متحده اختصاص داده شده و در ساسبو، ناگازاکی ژاپن مستقر است.
mt: The United States Navy is also investigating the incident. In a statement, they said, "The crew is currently working to identify the best safe method to remove the ship." The ship was a minesweeper of the Avenger class, and was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the Seventh Fleet and is homeported in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: اواخر روز یکشنبه،‌ رئیس جمهور ایالات متحده، دونالد ترامپ در بیانیه‌ای از طریق دبیر مطبوعاتی کاخ سفید اعلام کرد نیروهای ایالات متحده از سوریه خارج خواهند شد. این اعلامیه پس از مکالمه تلفنی ترامپ با رئیس‌جمهور ترکیه،‌ رجب طیب اردوغان، منتشر شد. ترکیه همچنین محافظت از جنگجویان اسیر داعش را بر عهده خواهد گرفت، که به گفته این بیانیه، کشور‌های اروپایی از بازگشت آنها به وطن خود جلوگیری کرده‌اند.
mt: On Sunday, President Donald Trump announced in a statement through White House press secretary that U.S. forces will be withdrawn from Syria. The statement was released after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey will also be responsible for guarding captured ISIS fighters, who according to the statement, have been prevented from returning to their home countries by European countries.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: پس از آنکه این سد در 1963 ساخته شد، از بروز سیل‌های فصلی که گل و لای آن در سراسر رودخانه پخش می‌شد، پیشگیری شد. این رسوب برای ایجاد سدهای ساحلی و سواحل ضروری است که زیستگاه‌های حیات‌وحش به حساب می‌آیند. در نتیجه، دو گونه ماهی منقرض شده اند، و دو گونه دیگر نیز در معرض خطر قرار گرفته اند، از جمله چاب کوهان دار. گرچه سطح آب پس از سیل چند پله افزایش می‌یابد، اما مقامات امیدوارند این وضعیت برای بازسازی سد ساحلی در پایین دست کافی باشد.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, it prevented the annual floods that spread silt along the river. This silt is necessary for the creation of coastal dams and beaches that are habitats for wildlife. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others are endangered, including the spotted chub. Although the water level rises a few steps after the flood, officials hope this will be enough to rebuild the coastal dam downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: سفارت ایالات متحده واقع در نایروبی، کنیا هشداری صادر کرده است مبنی بر اینکه «افراط گرایان از سومالی» قصد دارند حملات انتحاری انفجاری را در کنیا و اتیوپی انجام دهند. ایالات متحده می‌گوید اطلاعاتی را از منبعی که نامش فاش نشده دریافت کرده است که به‌طور خاص استفاده از بمب‌گذاران انتحاری را برای منفجر کردن «نقاط دیدنی برجسته» در اتیوپی و کنیا را ذکر می‌کند.
mt: The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, has issued a warning that "Somali extremists" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States says it has received information from an unnamed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to blow up "prominent tourist sites" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: وکلای مشهور یونانی، ساکیس کچاگیوگلو و جورج نیکلاکوپولوس به جرم اختلاس و فساد در زندان کوریدالوس آتن زندانی شده اند. در نتیجه این، رسوایی بزرگ در جامعه حقوقی یونان از طریق قرار گرفتن در معرض اقدامات غیرقانونی که قضات، وکلا و مشاورین در طی سالهای گذشته انجام داده اند، ایجاد شده است. چند هفته پیش، پس از اطلاعات منتشر شده توسط روزنامه نگار ماکیس تریانتافیلوپولوس در نمایش تلویزیونی محبوب خود «زونگالا» در آلفا تی وی، عضو پارلمان و وکیل، پطروس مانتووالوس، به دلیل اینکه اعضای دفتر وی درگیر اختلاس و فساد شده بودند، دستگیر شد. علاوه بر این، قاضی ارشد اوانجلوس کالوسیس به اتهام فساد و رفتار‌های زندانی است زیرا وی را به جرم فساد و رفتارهای فسادگونه زندانی است.
mt: Notable Greek lawyers, Saki Kechagiaoglou and George Nikolakopoulos, have been imprisoned in the Korydallos prison in Athens for embezzlement and corruption. As a result, a major scandal in the Greek legal community has been created through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers and consultants have been performing over the past years. A few weeks ago, after information published by journalist Makis Triantafyllopoulos in his popular TV show "Zongala" on Alpha TV, MP and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos, was arrested for his office members being involved in embezzlement and corruption. In addition, Supreme Court Judge Evangelos Kalos, is being imprisoned for corruption and corrupt behavior as he was imprisoned for corruption and corrupt behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."
